name: Le Méridien Vienna
description: An individual design hotel in Vienna in the comfort zone. Le Méridien Vienna is style not bivouac, it is art puzzle and gallery. Located in the heart of Vienna, the design hotel is at the hub of the city’s artistic jewels. They surprise and inspire. Spacious + newly designed guest rooms + suites make you happy, in roomy bathrooms you revive. Your view falls on Vienna’s splendid Ringstrasse, the serene Schillerplatz, or sun-filled courtyard. At last - vacation in Vienna, at Le Méridien hotel in the city’s epicentre. Develop your company at Le Méridien conference hotel in Vienna. Celebrate the happiest day of your life at Le Méridien wedding hotel - straight or gay. You sleep regally, dine magnificently. Le Méridien hotel the cosmopolitan Viennese.Marriott

name: Hilton Vienna Plaza
description: Beautifully located on Ringstrasse, Hilton Vienna Plaza is within walking distance of St. Stephen's Cathedral, Burgtheater, the State Opera and Hofburg Imperial Palace. You'll find exclusive amenities and unique service in this designer hotel, just 20 minutes' drive from the airport. Sample French- and Austrian-inspired cuisine at Brasserie, EMILE – the winner of a toque from Gault Millau in 2015. The restaurant guide's inspectors awarded the brasserie with 14 points, a fine rating for high quality food. Enjoy specialties prepared with fresh seasonal ingredients and an excellent selection of Austrian and international wines. During the day and well into the night, relax with Martini specials, absinthe and other delicious drinks at our hotel bar. Conveniently located in Vienna's commercial center, Hilton Vienna Plaza provides a Lobby Lounge connectivity station with both PC and Mac computers. Before arrival and through departure, your Plaza host will reach out to ensure your experience is everything you want it to be. Business meetings are easy using our flexible function rooms for 2-150 guests. WiFi is available throughout the hotel and all meeting rooms offer natural daylight. A/V and videoconferencing equipment are available for rent. Our timeless guest rooms offer a range of thoughtful amenities, such as a work desk and a marble bathroom. Upgrade to a suite for a separate living room. Executive rooms and suites include exclusive Executive Lounge access with complimentary breakfast, snacks and drinks. The hotel's exterior complements the architectural and ornamental features of the street and the city, including its facade, building height and golden brass railings. Inside, you'll discover the drawings, watercolors and art work by Austrian artists during 1850-1950. Art Deco touches are on display in the lobby and in guest rooms, too.Hilton

name: Steigenberger Hotel Herrenhof
description: Built in 1913, Steigenberger Hotel Herrenhof is located in the centre of the first district of Vienna, only a few steps from the Hofburg Imperial Palace. Free WiFi is available. The Herrenhof’s air-conditioned rooms are very spacious and comfortably furnished. The Viennese studio Einwaller decorated the rooms and other parts of the hotel with 21st century interpretations of various styles, from Baroque to Art Déco. The Steigenberger Hotel Herrenhof offers a varied spa programme in an elegant and relaxed atmosphere. The spa covers 250 m² over 2 floors and includes 2 saunas. A fitness centre is also available on site. The surrounding historic part of Vienna is a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage Site. The Kohlmarkt and Graben luxury shopping streets as well as St. Stephen's Cathedral can be reached within less than a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Herrenhof. The Hofburg Congress and Event Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Plaza Premium Wien
description: Located in Vienna, 3.5 km from Vienna Main Railway Station, PLAZA Premium Wien provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel features a sauna and an ATM. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. At PLAZA Premium Wien all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Romanian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Wien Westbahnhof Railway Station is 4.2 km from PLAZA Premium Wien, while Schönbrunn Palace is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hilton Vienna Waterfront
description: Soak up stunning views of the River Danube from the Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel, located on the waterfront hotel in Vienna. Our Vienna hotel offers a quick underground connection to the city center - 7 minutes. Enjoy the comfort of spacious guest rooms and a sparkling outdoor pool. Sample delicious international and Austrian dishes, prepared with the freshest seasonal ingredients, at the Waterfront restaurant. During the summer months enjoy meals and drinks on the spacious Waterfront terrace. Catch up with friends throughout the day and enjoy a drink or tasty snack in the welcoming Pier 269 Bar and Lounge. Business is a pleasure at the Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel offering a business-service center, an elegant boardroom, nine meeting rooms flooded with natural light and the Grand Waterfront Hall with foyer for events catering up to 600 persons. Enjoy panoramic views of Vienna's skyline in the 8th floor Executive Lounge. All guest rooms at Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel offer WiFi and a separate working area.Hilton

name: NH Danube City
description: NH Danube City is in the ideal location for business and pleasure. The hotel is right by the UN Building and the Vienna International Center. You can reach Vienna’s city center by public transportation, and the Kaisermühlen-Vienna International Center station is very close to the hotel. Guests can shop at the nearby Donauzentrum shopping center or enjoy the recreational activities available on Danube Island, for example yachting and tennis. The comfortable and modern rooms at NH Danube City are equipped with free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee facilities. Some of the rooms have spectacular views of the Danube River. From the 18th floor you will get an amazing outlook over the city. Breakfast will give you energy for the day with a varied spread of delicious foods and beverages. Enjoy your lunch and dinner at Tarragona restaurant, which serves both à-la-carte and buffet-style meals. Accompany your dinner with a great wine from our extensive list, or enjoy a drink at the bar, which you will also find a restaurant at one end. For business travelers, there are 10 meeting rooms. There is also a gym at the hotel and guests enjoy special rates at a nearby spa.NH Hoteles

name: NH Collection Wien Zentrum
description: NH Collection Wien Zentrum, Vienna, formerly known as NH Wien Atterseehaus, is located on the Mariahilferstrasse, one of the longest shopping streets in Europe. Some of the main attractions in Vienna are a short distance away, including the city’s Museum Quarter. Guests enjoy easy access to designer shops, restaurants, and bars. Directly in front of the hotel is the Zieglergasse subway station providing easy links to the rest of the city. The hotel is set in a 7-story building with a grand façade painted in the mid-nineties by Austrian pop artist Christian Ludwig Attersee. NH Collection Wien Zentrum offers some of the most spacious accommodations in Vienna so that guests can feel at home. The newly-renovated rooms are designed for your comfort and feature rain-effect showers, relaxation chairs and NH sleep better mattresses. Some also have access to a balcony and kitchenettes. Guests can stay connected with free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. In the mornings, enjoy a fresh, delicious breakfast on the hotel’s rooftop terrace, which provides spectacular views of the city. For guests staying on the weekend, the hotel offers Lazy Sundays with free late checkout and breakfast until noon. The hotel has a compact gym and sauna facilities.NH Hoteles

name: NH Wien City
description: The NH Wien City hotel is set in a perfect location on Mariahilferstrasse and puts guests within easy reach of excellent shopping selections and points of interest. The Leopold Museum and Museum of Natural History are less than a kilometer away and Vienna’s historical city center is only a 10-minute walk. The Neubaugasse metro station is conveniently situated in front of the hotel. Each of our 105 spacious rooms offer modern conveniences. Free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and coffee and tea-making facilities come as standard in every room. For those looking for even greater comfort, we offer an Apartment Suite which has a separate sitting area and kitchenette complete with Nespresso machine. In the mornings, guests are welcome to enjoy a healthy breakfast buffet. For early risers, we offer an early bird breakfast option. Our open bar supplies light refreshments 24 hours a day, every day. Given the numerous local restaurants, we will gladly recommend high-quality dining options for lunch and dinner. Our compact gym, sauna and relaxation area are additional amenities that our guests can enjoy. To further enhance your stay, an 8 seater airport shuttle is available and our 24-hour front desk is ready to provide additional amenities upon request.NH Hoteles

name: NH Wien Belvedere
description: Conveniently situated within a five minute walk of the Belvedere Palace, the beautiful NH Wien Belvedere hotel provides guests with the perfect stay. The hotel is only three tram stops away from downtown Vienna with its famous State Opera, Hundertwasserhaus, and Stephansdom. Rennweg train station is only a few steps away from the hotel. All of the 114 rooms have traditional décor with modern amenities including free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and a minibar. Connecting rooms are also available. Our spacious rooms on the upper floors offer lovely views of Belvedere Park or the botanic garden. A tasty breakfast buffet is served daily. Guests are welcome to request an early bird breakfast or made-to-order hot dishes. For lunch and dinner, our staff will happily recommend local options such as Salmbräu which is a popular brewery serving roasted ham hock. For quick refreshments, the self-serve open bar has numerous choices. Our compact fitness center is free for guests to use and lockers are available. There is also a sauna, steam bath, and relaxation room for the optimal experience. Our professional staff is always on hand to ensure that guests have the perfect stay.NH Hoteles

name: Rosewood Vienna
description: Set in Vienna, a few steps from St. Peter's Catholic Church, Rosewood Vienna offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from St. Stephen's Cathedral. All rooms include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some boast city views. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. At the hotel guests are welcome to take advantage of a spa centre. Popular points of interest near Rosewood Vienna include Vienna Volksgarten, House of Music and Hofburg. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Theaterhotel & Suites Wien
description: The Theaterhotel & Suites Wien is a 4-star hotel in a very central location directly next to the famous “Theater in der Josefstadt”, Vienna’s oldest theatre. The magnificent buildings of the Ringstrasse can be reached in a few minutes’ walk. The Town Hall, the Burgtheater, the Parliament and the University are only a few steps away. After a long business day or a sightseeing tour through Vienna, you will enjoy the quiet ambience in this hotel, the rooms will provide relaxing moments. Start the day with a breakfast, enjoy the offer of our buffet and strengthen yourself for the day. Parking is possible at a surcharge and needs to be reserved in advance (subject to availability).

name: Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph
description: Located in an elegant residential area in Vienna's 19th district, Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph offers an elegant lobby bar and a spa area with a sauna and fitness room. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph come with bathrooms and satellite TV. Some rooms also include a fully equipped kitchen, a large seating area, and a balcony or terrace. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in our newly renovated Kaiserbar in the lobby late into the evening. Buffet breakfast is available. The Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph is situated in the elegant residential district of Döbling in the city's northwest. From here, guests can reach Vienna’s centre in just 20 minutes with tram line 38, which stops 100 metres away. In summer, many Heuriger (traditional Viennese wine taverns) are nearby.

name: Park Hyatt Vienna
description: The Park Hyatt Vienna is located in the city centre's Golden Quarter, in a former bank building dating back to the early 1900s and combines luxury with Viennese elegance. It offers a luxurious wellness area with an indoor swimming pool, a 24-hour reception, and an à la carte restaurant. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. Ranging from 35 to 170 m² in size, the air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Park Hyatt are elegantly furnished, combining modern appliances with typical Viennese décor. Each unit features a flat-screen TV, a fully-stocked minibar and a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can choose from various dining options, including brasserie classics and modern drinks at the historical The Bank Brasserie & Bar, a selection of whiskys at the Living Room Lounge, traditional Viennese coffee specialities at the Café am Hof and afternoon tea at the Lounge. At the in-house wellness area Arany Spa guests can indulge in a vast selection of relaxing beauty and body treatments or exercise at the state-of-the-art fitness centre and at the 15-metre-long indoor swimming pool. Park Hyatt Vienna offers 800 square metres of modern meeting space in beautifully-restored historical room. All venues are equipped with state-of-the-art technology. Some of Vienna's most famous sights, including Saint Stephen's Square and Cathedral, and the Kärntner Straße shopping street, can be easily reached within a 5-minute walk from the Park Hyatt. Several luxury shops as well as many bars and cafés are also just steps away. The Hofburg Congress and Event Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Palais Coburg Residenz
description: Palais Coburg Hotel Residenz is a 5-star luxury hotel in a historic building in the centre of Vienna. It offers air-conditioned suites, a gourmet restaurant, and free WiFi and wired internet access. An exclusive spa area over the roofs of Vienna, featuring a sauna, a steam bath, a hot tub, an indoor pool and a sun terrace, is available at Palais Coburg Hotel Residenz. There is also a modern fitness centre. A bottle of champagne, a fruit/chocolate treatment and a flower bouquet are provided to all guests. The price also includes free minibar consumption. Austrian and international gourmet cuisine, as well as a wide selection of fine wines are served in Silvio Nickol Gourmet Restaurant and in the Restaurant Clementine im Glashaus. On New Years Eve, guests can enjoy a gala dinner. Please note that there is a dress code (black tie). Palais Coburg Hotel Residenz is only a short walk away from St. Stephen’s Cathedral, the Stadtpark, and several underground stations.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna, located in four historic 19th-century palaces combines legendary service with Austrian hospitality. The 200 luxurious guest rooms and suites are generously proportioned and stylishly furnished. The Ritz-Carlton Club Lounge on the 7th floor pampers its guests with personalized service as well as five culinary offers per day. The Ritz-Carlton Spa has elegantly appointed treatment suites, an 18m indoor pool and a range of amenities that invite our guests to unique spa experiences. Unique culinary delights await guests at the farm-to-table Dstrikt Steakhouse, during aperitivo time at Pastamara - Bar con Cucina and the elegant hotel bar D-bar. Located on the 8th floor rooftop terrace, the Atmosphere Rooftop Bar offers a breathtaking view over the city. Located in the heart of the city and only a short walk from the city park, the luxury hotel is the perfect starting point to discover Vienna.Marriott

name: Vienna Marriott Hotel
description: Experience Austrias beautiful capital city in style when you choose Vienna Marriott Hotel. An upscale experience in the heart of Vienna our premium hotel is located downtown in the historic City Center with exceptional placement on the breathtaking Ringstrasse. Unwind in modern guest rooms and suites many of which boast incredible city views and blend contemporary design with unmatched comfort. Relax on plush pillowtop bedding while staying connected using our high speed WiFi access. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes your four legged best friend with special amenities. Workout in our fully equipped Golden Tree Spa or take a dip in the heated indoor pool. After exploring Vienna dine at our onsite restaurants or unwind at our inviting bars. Our newly renovated, state of the art meeting venues offer nearly 9000 square feet of elegant space. With our ideal location guests have easy access to shopping, dining and famous attractions like the Vienna Opera House or St Stephens Cathedral.Marriott

name: Eventhotel Pyramide
description: Directly opposite the SCS, Austria’s largest shopping centre, Eventhotel Pyramide features a large spa and recreation area with indoor and outdoor pools and free access for guests. Free WiFi is available in public areas and some rooms. The air-conditioned rooms offer a safe, minibar, satellite TV, and bathroom with a hairdryer. Featuring a 42-metre pyramid, which hosts an event centre for up to 4,000 people, Eventhotel is surrounded by 45,000 m² of greenery. The restaurant includes a garden and a bar with a terrace. An 18-hole golf course in Brunn am Gebirge is only 5-minute drive away and offers discounted green fees to guests of Eventhotel Pyramide. The Badener Bahn railway line stops right in front of Hotel Pyramide and takes you to Vienna’s State Opera, as well as to the centre of Baden, within 25 minutes. Free parking is possible on site. The A2, A21 and A23 motorways can be reached within a 5-minute drive.

name: Novotel Wien City
description: Novotel Wien City features modern family-friendly rooms with balconies overlooking Ringstrasse, a lobby with a colorful play area for kids and 24 hours fitness center. Enjoy regional and organic-certified cuisine at the breakfast buffet and our Family and Friends restaurant. Our location near popular Viennese attractions like the Prater, cathedral and St. Stephens Square makes it ideal for exploring the city.accorhotels.com

name: Maxx By Steigenberger Vienna
description: MAXX Hotel Vienna is conveniently and centrally located between Westbahnhof Train Station and the city centre. All rooms and suites feature a modern design and all contemporary amenities. Within a few minutes you can reach the most beautiful squares and sights in the heart of Vienna. A wide range of shops and restaurants is just steps away from the hotel. The Naschmarkt open-air market is 2 underground stops away, and Schönbrunn Palace is 3 stops away.

name: 25hours Hotel Vienna at MuseumsQuartier
description: The 25hours Hotel at MuseumsQuartier plays with the dreams and sensations associated with the world of the circus. From the museum district to the Prater, the Opera Ball, the Life Ball and the city's many music venues, Vienna has always been synonymous with sensations and shows. The hotel symbolizes the tradition steeped institution that is the circus. It is surreal, surprising and sexy a place that plays with fantasies and the exotic. The lines between imagination, reality, space and time are blurred.accorhotels.com

name: Renaissance Wien Hotel
description: Ideally located in a quiet section of Vienna Renaissance Wien Hotel welcomes those traveling in Austria with thoughtful amenities and a prime location near the city center. Our 4 star family friendly hotel reveals the best of Vienna. Our hotel is pet friendly, we welcome trained pets for a EUR 18 per night non-refundable fee. The property is steps from the U-Bahn subway station and near popular attractions, including historic Schonbrunn Palace, the legendary Naschmarkt and iconic St. Stephen's Cathedral. Recharge in stylishly redesigned, pet-friendly accommodations. Every room and suite features modern decor, indulgent bedding, mini-refrigerators, ample workstations and free WiFi. Order from 24-hour room service or indulge at our outstanding restaurant. Work off the day in our hotel's fitness center and visit the sauna and salt room. For those planning events our sophisticated venues are ideal for everything from business training sessions to romantic weddings.Marriott

name: K+K Hotel Maria Theresia
description: Located in Vienna, K+K Hotel Maria Theresia is within a 25-minute drive of Vienna International Airport and offers free wireless internet access in all areas and a sauna. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has a fitness centre with a sauna. Multilingual staff can assist with reservations or dining recommendations, and an express check-in facility is offered for guest convenience. Rooms feature modern features, including mini bars and flat-screen TVs. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's living area. A satisfying breakfast is served every morning at K+K Hotel Maria Theresia, and there are numerous restaurants and cafés close by. K+K Hotel Maria Theresia is ideally located for sightseeing in Vienna with Austrian Parliament Building and the Kunsthistorisches Museum within walking distance. The Vienna State Opera and Karlsplatz Train Station can easily be reached on foot.Revato

name: Hilight Suites Hotel
description: Perfect location in the city center close to the city park. 50 suites of our hotel originate from the Viennese Grnderzeit and can be booked in 3 categories. In addition to the elegant design, the suites impress with their size, high-quality equipment and an ideal room layout. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the house. Our sauna and fitness area provides relaxation and sports activities. Start each morning with our breakfast of selected organic products. 24h Rezeption.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Zeitgeist Vienna Hauptbahnhof
description: Only 300 metres from Vienna Main Train Station and the Südtiroler Platz Underground Station (line U1), Hotel Zeitgeist Vienna Hauptbahnhof offers rooms with free high-speed WiFi and a restaurant. The fitness room with modern TechnoGym equipment and the sauna with infrared cabin are available to guests free of charge. The air-conditioned rooms come with large windows, comfortable beds, a large flat-screen cable TV and a bathroom with a shower or a bathtub. Some rooms have an own terrace. À la carte dishes are served in the Lokal-Café-Bar Pergola. There are also vending machines provided on floors 3 to 6. In the chill and workout area in the Zeitgeist Hotel's courtyard, guests can play badminton and boccia, and use a power rack and a putting green. A fitness room is also available. A private parking garage, which can be used against a surcharge, is located on site. The hotel’s front desk is staffed 24 hours a day. The Keplerplatz Underground Station (line U1) is 600 metres away and provides connection to Vienna’s city centre and the Wiener Prater Amusement Park.

name: So/ Vienna
description: SO/ Vienna is so lively, expressive and energetic so that even experienced travelers are constantly fascinated. The playful and consciously deliberately rebellious interpretation of luxury makes it a dazzling addition to the local hotel scene. Award-winning cuisine and an impressive view over Vienna are part of the "Just Say SO" Service.accorhotels.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater/Messe
description: Immerse yourself in 4-star amenities at Courtyard Vienna Prater/Messe in Austria. Our beautifully-designed hotel offers travelers a fantastic resting spot in the heart of Vienna's vibrant cityscape with easy access to the Vienna Fairgrounds, the new business quarter, the U2 Krieau Subway Station and the Messe Wien Exhibition & Congress Center. Enjoy taking walks through the nearby Prater's green spaces before rejuvenating your energy in our spacious gym or wellness center. In the evening, enjoy specialty cocktails in our lobby lounge before dining in our hotel's delicious signature restaurant. Retreat to spacious, modern rooms and suites for a peaceful night's sleep with comfortable bedding and soundproof windows. If visiting Vienna for event planning reasons, take advantage of our 14 flexible venue spaces with state-of-the-art technology, ample parking space, professional planners and catering services. Whatever your reason for visiting, we look forward to welcoming you at Courtyard Vienna Prater/Messe.Marriott

name: Arcotel Wimberger Vienna
description: ARCOTEL Wimberger Wien provides direct access to Vienna's main sights, thanks to its location facing tram services and the Burggasse-Stadthalle Metro Stop. On-site facilities include a wellness and fitness area offering a hot tub, sauna, and views over the city. WiFi is available free of charge. The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and fitted with modern furnishings. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work desk and en-suite bathroom with a bath and selected shower products are also featured. The Handwerk restaurant serves classical and trendy Austrian dishes, inspired by international influences. All meals are freshly cooked, using only the best-quality and regional products. A wide range of drinks and a small selection of snacks are available at Joe's Bar, which is decorated in a colonial style. During summer, guests can enjoy drinks and light snacks in the courtyard. ARCOTEL Wimberger Wien is only a 5-minute walk from the Mariahilfer Straße shopping street and the newly renovated Western Train Station, which features many shopping possibilities. The Stadthalle Indoor Concert Arena is 100 metres away from the property.

name: das Reinisch business hotel
description: Set in Schwechat, 13 km from Ernst Happel Stadium, Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Offering a bar, the property is located within 14 km of Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Austrian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. Belvedere Palace is 15 km from Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant, while Vienna Prater is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International, 4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: NH Vienna Airport Conference Center
description: The NH Vienna Airport Conference Center hotel, previously known as NH Wien Airport, is favorably located across from the arrivals hall of Vienna International Airport. As such, there are numerable transportation options close by, including a train station and bus and CAT stations. The Flugenhafen Wien is within walking distance and the hotel is approximately 16 minutes from the Historic Center of Vienna. Nearby shopping at Shopping City Süd and Naschmarkt are easily accessible via local transport. Our 499 soundproofed guest rooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a minibar. Our larger upgraded rooms have additional features including connecting rooms, bathrobes, and Nespresso machines. Each morning guests are treated to a breakfast buffet and made-to-order hot dishes are available upon request. The in-hotel Restaurant Mundo offers national and international cuisine for lunch or dinner, including the traditional Wiener Schnitzel. An additional buffet restaurant offers more extensive self-serve dishes. On the ground floor, guests can grab a quick cocktail or unwind a while at The Bar which offers light meals along with a large variety of beverages. Our 21 meeting rooms vary in size, and can hold up to 500 people.NH Hoteles

name: Flemings Selection Hotel Wien City
description: The Flemings Selection Hotel Wien-City is situated in the Josefstadt district, right in the centre of the Danube metropolis. Viennas famous landmarks, St. Stephans Cathedral, the Hofburg and the State Opera, are close to the hotel, which gives satisfaction with its exceptional service, exclusive comfort and a unique design concept. The finest cuisine in a stress-free atmosphere that is the philosophy of the hotels restaurant. Only fresh ingredients from selected suppliers are used. The wine list is also absolutely first class, with its inspiring selection of national and international quality wines. For business guests, the 6 modern meeting rooms and board rooms offer an individual setting for meetings, banquets and conferences.In order to guarantee you a safe stay in our hotels, we implemented a significantly strengthened security concept. This includes, among other things, exclusively cashless payment and the closing of the minibar in the room. Drinks can be purchased at the reception instead.iHotelier/iStay

name: Vienna Sporthotel
description: Vienna Sporthotel is set in a quiet neighbourhood in Vienna's 3rd district, with easy access to the A4 and A23 motorways and only a 5-minute underground train ride from the city centre, offering an outdoor pool, tennis courts and a spa area. Free WiFi is available and an underground car park with charging station for e-cars is featured. All spacious and air-conditioned rooms come with a minibar, a work desk and flat-screen satellite TV with free pay TV channels. Vienna Sporthotel features a solar-heated outdoor pool (open from May to September), 10 tennis courts (also open from May to September) and a fitness centre and guests can use all free of charge. The spa area is a good place to unwind after a busy day. The Sporthotel also has a restaurant serving international and Italian cuisine, as well as a bar in the lobby. In nice weather, guests can dine outside on the restaurant's terrace. The Schlachthausgasse Underground Station (line U3) can be reached in a 5-minute walk, providing direct connections to the centre. It is a 5-minute walk to the Media Quarter Marx, and just a 2-minute walk to the TownTown Business Park. From April to October, guests can rent motor scooters (Vespa) at the hotel. Guests who requested garage parking can use the e-car charging station free of charge.

name: Hotel Sans Souci Wien
description: Hotel Sans Souci Wien is situated directly opposite the Museum Quarter and a 5-minute walk from the Ringstraße Boulevard in the centre of Vienna. The large Sans Souci Spa includes an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. In the Sans Souci Spa, guests can also relax in a sauna, a steam bath, and a relaxing area free of charge. A modern fitness centre with a personal trainer is available as well. The Sans Souci Hotel also features a bar and the Veranda restaurant, where guests can enjoy Austrian and international cuisine. The spacious rooms feature elegant interior design and works by various well-known artists. They are air-conditioned and include parquet floors, a minibar, a flat-screen satellite TV, and an iPod docking station. Bathrooms feature bathrobes, toiletries, and a hairdryer. Public parking is available at the Museum Quarter, with valet parking offered by the hotel. The Volkstheater Underground Station (lines U2 and U3) is just a 2-minute walk away. St. Stephen’s Cathedral can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Arcadia
description: The Best Western Plus® Hotel Arcadia opened in 2013. For this purpose, a beautiful old typical Viennese building from the 1900's was completely rebuilt, while preserving the art nouveau flavor. This results in a striking mix of the 19th and the 21st century. The Best Western Plus Hotel Arcadia offers you 72 rooms, all equipped with mini-bar, air conditioning, room safe, satellite-television, Wi-Fi as well as high-speed cable Internet, and much more. The interior is elegant and comfortable. Many of the changes which were accomplished during the building process have an ecological background. For example, the heating and cooling system is state-of-the-art, reducing our carbon footprint to a sustainable level. For those interested in seminars and conferences, we offer a fully-equipped conference room for up to 30 participants (projector, audio-system, wireless microphone). Feel free to enjoy a nice drink in our lounge or to relax in the courtyard. Located in the heart of the second district of Vienna, it is only a five minute walk to the Prater, a premium spot for jogging, cycling, or to take a walk in the woods. But mostly the Prater is famous for being a huge amusement park, suited for children and adults alike. Vienna´s largest exhibition center, the Reed Wien Messe, is a ten minute walk from the hotel. Also the historic center is easily reachable, either by underground train, car or other means of transportation. It is only a five minute walk to the Praterstern Station, a major transportation hub (with bus, underground train, tram, and train stops).bestwestern.com

name: Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt
description: Located in Vienna, 600 metres from Museum of Military History, Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Conveniently set in the 10. Favoriten district, this hotel features a bar, as well as a sauna and a spa centre. The accommodation offers room service, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a stovetop. At Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Languages spoken at the reception include Arabic, German, English and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Belvedere Palace, Vienna Main Railway Station and Karlskirche. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 17 km from Andaz Vienna Am Belvedere - a concept by Hyatt.

name: Grand Hotel Wien
description: The Grand Hotel Wien is located just off the famous Ring Strasse, moments away from the world-renowned Vienna State Opera and the elegant shopping mile of Kaerntner Strasse. Positioned in the central heart of the city, the hotel is a short 35-minute drive from the airport, and a five-minute walk from the Hauptbahnhof and Wien Mitte train stations Throughout Autumn and Winter, the Grand Hotel’s visitors flock to the nearby Christmas markets and traditional coffee houses for warming refreshments, decadent cakes and a special taste of historic Vienna An important part of the city since 1870, The Grand Hotel Wien is famed for exquisite hospitality and refined luxury. Featuring five restaurants and bars, a state-of-the-art spa, an expansive ballroom and 12 meeting and event rooms, it is perfect for relaxing city breaks, business trips, conferences and romantic escapes.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Austria Trend Hotel Savoyen Vienna
description: Formerly the historic Austrian State Print, the Austria Trend Hotel Savoyen Vienna impresses with its perfect blend of classical and modern architecture. 266 rooms and 43 suites invite you to feel at home among the elegant and modern architecture and tasteful design.The daylight-bathed atrium is the focal point of Savoyen Hotel. From here, our guests can access the 309 rooms & suites, the fitness and wellness area and Viennas largest hotel ballroom, measuring a total of 1056 m the ideal venue for events and meetings.Have a pleasant stay at the Austria Trend Hotel Savoyen Vienna and enjoy a journey trough several important epochs of a lively metropoles history exactly where prestigious villas used to impress at ancient times.iHotelier/iStay

name: Flemings Hotel Wien-Stadthalle (former Flemings Conference Wien)
description: Imperial splendour and United Nations city, wine taverns and Hip-Hop: Vienna lives from its contradictions. It is good if one can rely on the typical Flemings ambience and atmosphere! The renowned Mariahilfer Strasse shopping mall is situated very close to the hotel and the Westbahnhof (Railway Station West) is only a few steps away. Enjoy Flemings culinary delights in peace, satisfy the in-between hunger pangs quickly and tastily: Flemings Brasserie & Wine Bar offers a special mix of French brasserie and delicatessen, a great deal of pleasure for all tastes. The conference area of 889 m with 11 multifunctional meeting rooms is the top address for congresses all types of events.In order to guarantee you a safe stay in our hotels, we implemented a significantly strengthened security concept. This includes, among other things, exclusively cashless payment and the closing of the minibar in the room. Drinks can be purchased at the reception instead.iHotelier/iStay

name: Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube
description: Providing river views, a garden and free WiFi, Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube is located in Vienna, 1.1 km from Ernst Happel Stadium and 2.9 km from Messe Wien. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a sun terrace. A bicycle rental service is available at Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube. Vienna Prater is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 16 km from Vienna Residence, Marina Tower - Danube.

name: Hilton Vienna Park
description: Home to Vienna's premier conference center, the Hilton Vienna hotel features 3,000 sq. m. of meeting space for 2-1800 participants with a choice of 21 meeting rooms. Set in the heart of Vienna, the hotel is just 16 minutes by direct train from Vienna International Airport. Try Austrian cuisine with a modern twist in LENZ – Social Dining restaurant or enjoy a drink in our urban bar, SELLENY’S. Work out in the well-equipped gym or unwind with the sauna, steam bath and relaxation area at the Hilton Vienna hotel. All 663 Hilton Guest Rooms feature park or city views and WiFi. Executive Rooms enjoy Executive Lounge access with free continental breakfast, snacks and drinks.Hilton

name: H+ Hotel Salzburg
description: At the HPlus Salzburg you stay in comfortable and charming completely 100 percent non-smoking rooms. The HPlus Salzburg is located centrally, directly at the train station Salzburg, and just a few minutes distance away from the baroque Old Town. The historic Old Town has been appointed World Heritage Site by the UNESCO in 1997. After strolling through it, enjoy a romantic carriage ride through the alleys of the Old Town, visit the Mirabelle Garden, or follow Mozarts steps around town and visit his birth-house and the house he lived in. Experience over 4000 concerts and theater productions from various genres every year. More than anything, the annual highlight of arts and culture, the Salzburg Festival, attracts many visitors year after year. Explore the beautiful landscape around Salzburg, visit one of the oldest show mines in the world, the open-air museum, and the Salzburg castles and fortresses, or simply enjoy the culinary side of this fascinating region. Start the day with a buffet Breakfast for a nominal fee. Our spa area promises relaxation on two floors with sauna, steam bath, solarium, Kneipp basins, Venus bath, and hydro-massage, or one of our various massages. Child charge - contact hotel for details. Max child occupancy in parents room is 17. The Zum Eulenspiegal restaurant is nearby. It is the most originally tavern in the old town of Salzburg.Wyndham

name: NH Collection Salzburg City
description: The NH Collection Salzburg City hotel sits close to some of Salzburg’s top attractions, including the Mirabell Palace and the Linzergasse. Plus, it’s surrounded by trendy bars, cool restaurants and stores from the world’s top designers. For business guests, the Salzburg Exhibition Center and Salzburg Arena are within easy reach. At the NH Collection Salzburg City, the lobby area is a space where you can experience modern urban elegance combined with traditional Austrian coffee culture. Expect to experience a warm atmosphere, where locals and travelers alike are sitting, chatting and enjoying time together. The hotel has 140 spacious guest rooms, which each benefit from warm interiors, hardwood floors and amenities like a satellite TV and a safe. Free Wi-Fi and a desk also make working and staying connected simple. The day starts with an extensive breakfast, which is served in the hotel restaurant. Meanwhile, Bottles & Jars in the lobby offers a great selection of drinks to pair with light and casual meals. In summer, cocktails are served on the terrace. When you want to relax, you can make the most of the hotel’s sauna and gym. For your convenience, parking and an electric vehicle charging station are also available.NH Hoteles

name: Sheraton Grand Salzburg
description: Book your stay at Austria's famous Mozart city & benefit from flexible and free cancellation policies at the Sheraton Grand Salzburg. Our 5 star hotel is adjacent to the world-famous Mirabell Gardens, the Mirabell Palace and Salzburg Congress Center. Overlooking the city or the garden, you can relax in the cozy atmosphere of our 168 spacious rooms and suites. A true highlight is our top floor ETAGE7 - an exclusive space high above the rooftops of Salzburg with breathtaking mountain scenery and a view to the Fortress Hohensalzburg. The Sheraton Club Lounge, newly designed for Marriott Bonvoy Members, is a place for working, relaxing and meeting friends. Enjoy Austrian cuisine in the modernized Restaurant Mirabell, or Italian classic at The taste.it restaurant. Live piano music and refreshing cocktails can be enjoyed at the Piano Bar, a gathering place in the heart of the lobby. Host your next meeting or event at our business hotel and let our team help you plan your successful event.Marriott

name: Wyndham Grand Salzburg Conference Centre
address: Fanny Von Lehnert Strasse 7, 5026 Salzburg, Salzburg
description: A 20-minute walk from Salzburg's Old Town and only 300 metres from the Main Train Station, the Wyndham Grand Salzburg Conference Centre has a fitness centre, a sauna, and an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. The Wyndham’s modern rooms offer air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a seating area and a bathroom with bathtub, toiletries, and hairdryer. Austrian and international dishes, as well as a wide range of exclusive drinks and cocktails, are served at the BarRoque. The Mirabell Gardens are a 10-minute walk away from the Wyndham Hotel & Conference Centre.

name: IMLAUER HOTEL PITTER Salzburg
description: First opened in 1864, the family run, 4 star superior hotel IMLAUER HOTEL PITTER enjoys a central location in close proximity to many of the famous landmarks and sights of Salzburg. Recently renovated, the hotel offers a panoramic view over the city and its surrounding from the IMLAUER Sky - Bar & Restaurant. All Rooms and Suites are newly renovated and soundproofing guarantees guests a relaxing stay. The units offer a minibar and a range of tea and coffee. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel and guests find a sauna and fitness facilities with mountain view. The rich buffet breakfast consisting of regional and organic products is served in the IMLAUER Sky - Restaurant. An a la carte breakfast is available until 14:00. The famous PitterKeller restaurant serves dishes which are typical for Salzburg and it surrounding region as well as a range of beer specialties. Salzburg main train station is only a 10 minute walk away from the hotel. Guests arriving by car can make use of the valet parking service or park their car themselves in the hotels own garage, both is at surcharge. The W.A. Mozart Airport is a 15 minute drive away.

name: Altstadthotel Wolf-Dietrich
description: A small, exclusive hotel with personal flair. It consists of two buildings, Altstadthotel and the Residenz, located opposite each other in a quiet side street of the city’s pedestrian area. It is just a few minutes walk to Mirabell Palace and Mozart’s Residence. You can leave your car in the garage as all of the city’s sights are within walking distance. For example the cathedral or the fortress, Mozart’s birthplace and the new Congress Hall. The hotel’s team at the reception are happy to assist you in booking concert or theatre tickets. You can also relax in our tastefully decorated sitting room. The spa, with it‘s warm colours and simple design, is ideal for relaxation. This compact leisure area comes complete with swimming pool, Finnish sauna, infra-red cubicle and an attractive 'silence' room with couches for relaxation after the sauna. We also suggest you take advantage of our massages.

name: Hotel Königgut
description: Just a 10-minute drive from Salzburg Airport, Hotel Königgut enjoys a quiet location on the outskirts of Salzburg. It offers a large spa area with a sauna and a steam bath, which is available in the evenings, and a fitness room. The Königgut Hotel’s spacious rooms have a balcony, flat-screen cable TV, seating area, and bathroom. The restaurant serves Austrian and international cuisine and a selection of Austrian wines. The garden includes a children’s playground. Free parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Gasthof Brandstätter
description: Double room standard: The 35 cozy rooms combine modern comfort with rural warmth. All rooms have: bath / shower, toilet, satellite TV, direct dial telephone (all rooms with modem connection), radio. Our garden-facing rooms in a quiet location are also equipped with a balcony. Non-smoking rooms on request. Green oasis on the outskirts of Salzburg. Family-run 4-star hotel with an excellent restaurant (1 toque Gault Millau). 35 newly renovated rooms in a charming country house style. All rooms are non-smoking and have a bath / shower, toilet, flat-screen TV with satellite connection, radio, free WiFi, desk, wooden floors. Smoking is possible in the hotel's restaurant and on the terrace in the 1st Floor possible. All garden-facing rooms are in a quiet location and equipped with a balcony. Wellness area with indoor pool, sunny terraces and cozy parlors with Salzburg rustic furniture. Friendly and very personal service. Costs on the spot: 40 free parking spacesVRBO

name: Hotel Gabi
description: Located in Wals on the green outskirts of Salzburg, Hotel Gabi has an outdoor pool and offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a balcony. Parking is free of charge. Hotel Gabi features a spa area with a sauna, a steam bath, an infrared cabin, and a modern fitness room. A rich breakfast buffet with many regional products is served in the morning. In summer, guests can have breakfast on the terrace and enjoy the views of the Untersberg Mountain. A children’s playground is only a few steps away from Hotel Gabi. All rooms feature air conditioning and guests can use the indoor pool. Additionally, a private beach is available 500 metres away. The centre of Salzburg, the airport, and the motorways can be reached in a few minutes’ drive from Hotel Gabi.

name: Schloss Mönchstein Hotel
description: Romantic 5-star superior hotel in Salzburg High above the roofs of Salzburg luxurious residing, delicious dining, celebrating and relaxing take centre stage. The 5-star-superior Hotel Schloss Monchstein in the heart of Salzburg offers its guests genuine exclusiveness: luxuriously furnished rooms and suites with elegant interior, gourmet-restaurant THE GLASS GARDEN, Monchstein SPA for pure wellness delight and breathtaking view to the city of Mozart.iHotelier/iStay

name: Achat Plaza Zum Hirschen
description: The Hotel zum Hirschen is Salzburgs oldest family-run hotel, conveniently located in the city center and only a few minutes by foot from the historic old town and the train station. Combining a historic building dating back to 1500 with modern, sustainable architecture by award-winning local architects and designers, this fully renovated hotel is bound to impress. Guests will not only enjoy beautifully designed rooms and public spaces but also a colorful garden with seating for an outdoor breakfast. The hotel features a spa & fitness area, a parking garage, a bar, seminar rooms and an adjacent restaurant run by a local up-and-coming chef, and a high-quality breakfast is served in the hotel’s own bistro. Guests can rent bicycles to explore the surrounding area. Salzburg’s Old Town can be reached within a 20-minute walk or a 5-minute bus ride from the Kiesel Bus Stop across the street.

name: Hotel Sacher Salzburg
description: Opened in 1866, the privately owned Hotel Sacher Salzburg is a grand, historic hotel which combines timeless elegance and tradition with highest standard of service. It is centrally located on the banks of the Salzach River with magnificent and unique views of the historic old town and Hohensalzburg Fortress. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. All rooms and suites are furnished in an individual fashion and offer state-of-the-art facilities. Each one has been personally decorated by Mrs. Elisabeth Gürtler, the hotel's owner, with a great love of details. Furnishings include original paintings and silk wallpapers. All rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and bathrobes. The restaurant Zirbelzimmer, whose wooden panelling and elaborately carved ceilings are unique in Salzburg, is a popular meeting place for gourmets. Restaurant Roter Salon is located on the footpath along the Salzach River and offers beautiful views of the old town and restaurant Salzachgrill serves barbecue specialties. The famous Café Sacher Salzburg serves the original Sacher cake in a typical Austrian coffee house ambience with an elegant touch. Sacher Bar serves a wide range of drinks accompanied by live piano music.

name: Hotel Leipziger Hof
description: The Leipziger Hof is a traditional, family-run 4-star hotel located directly opposite the Rapoldi City Park and a 15-minute walk from Innsbruck Main Train Station, offering air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has 50 guest rooms, some of which can be booked as family suites with connecting doors. All rooms (non-smoking) are modernized and equipped with bath/shower, toilet, air conditioning, telephone, free internet access (WLAN and broadband), flat screen TV, coffee & tea facility, room safe, hairdryer. On the top floor you will find a relaxation area with sauna, steam bath and infrared loungers. Panoramic view included. An à la carte restaurant is integrated directly into the hotel and offers regional and Austrian cuisine from Monday to Friday. A daily breakfast buffet is available from 07:00 to 10:00 and until 11:00 on weekends. The Old Town can be reached in a 15-minute walk, while a tram stop is 50 metres away. This property has a paid park places and a paid an e-charging station.

name: Austria Trend Hotel Congress Innsbruck
description: The Hotel Congress is at the foot of the Tyrolean Alps, just a few minutes walking distance from the historic old town and Innsbruck exhibition centre, right next to the Nordketten funicular railway. The 104 rooms and 2 suites combine elegant design with wood and offer all the amenities of a modern hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Stage 12 Hotel By Penz
description: Open since end of 2017 and very centrally situated in Innsbruck, 300 metres from the Golden Roof, STAGE 12 Hotel by Penz is an elegant city hotel and boasts a spa and fitness centre. The hotel has a terrace and views of the mountain, and guests can enjoy a cocktail at the modern hotel bar. Free WiFi is available. Occupying a new building and a history building, each room is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. You will find a kettle in the room. Each room includes a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. The ample breakfast buffet offers a broad variety of regional products. The spa features a sauna, a steam bath and fitness area. All major points of interests are in the vicinity of the hotel, such as State Museum of Tyrol - Ferdinandeum, Imperial Palace, the federal state government, the Universitätsklinik Hospital and the Congress. The Messe Innsbruck is a 14-minute walk away. Innsbruck Airport is 4 km from the property, while Innsbruck main train station is 1 km away.

name: Grauer Bär
description: The Hotel Grauer Bär is located in the city centre of Innsbruck, just a 2-minute walk from the historic Old Town. It offers air-conditioned rooms and a spa area with a panoramic swimming pool on the fifth floor. There are 2 restaurants and a hotel bar. From the breakfast room and the spa area of the Grauer Bär Hotel, you can enjoy panoramic views over the roofs of Innsbruck and the surrounding Tyrolean mountain scenery. The Woodfire restaurant serves steak specialities, including dry aged beef. The reception area has been completely renovated in July 2014.

name: Sporthotel Igls
description: Dating from 1889, this elegant chalet-style hotel in Igls, 1 km from the new Patscherkofel Cable Car and 5 km from Innsbruck, offers panoramic views over Innsbruck and the mountains, a private golf course, and a large spa area with an indoor pool. The individually designed rooms and suites at Sporthotel IGLS are furnished in an elegant Alpine style and offer panoramic mountain views. They feature a minibar, a seating area, satellite TV, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. A set menu of classic Austrian cuisine and Tyrolean specialties made from seasonal products from nearby organic farms are served in the restaurant. The Sporthotel also features a light-flooded winter garden and a rustically designed lobby with a bar and an open fireplace. The 500 m² spa features a spa lounge, Finnish sauna, Kneipp shower, relaxation areas, and fitness centre. The indoor pool provides direct garden access. In summer, guests can rent bicycles and benefit from 6 free guided hiking tours per week, organised in cooperation with the famous Alpine School of Innsbruck. Tennis courts are only a 5-minute walk away, and 2 other golf courses are also nearby.

name: voco Villach, an IHG Hotel
description: Welcome to voco® Villach, where modern convenience and thoughtful design combine in a beautiful location by the River Drau. Moments from Villach’s historic Altstadt, our contemporary hotel is an easy walk from the railway station and close to both Klagenfurt (KLU) and Ljubljana (LJU) airports, but still just a short drive from the pristine lakes and mountains of Carinthia.With stunning city views our stylish Standard rooms all come with considerate voco™ extras, including premium bedding, aerated showers and bedside charging points. Premium rooms overlook the Drau, and you’ll find spacious, separate living areas in our 7th-floor Suites, some with large terraces.If you're here on business, you'll have direct access to the neighbouring Congress Center Villach, where 20 well-equipped meeting rooms can accommodate up to 2,000 delegates. Our in-house function facilities include 3 meeting rooms, the Penthouse Suite and a river-view terrace for special occasions. You can tuck into a buffet breakfast, enjoy gourmet dining in the LAGANA gourmet restaurant, or fill up on snacks all day in the LAGANA Bar.When the time comes to relax, we've got the latest cardio equipment at the Vitality Club gym, as well as stress-busting saunas and massages in the spa.Warm service, unstuffy design and all the comforts of home – that's voco® Villach.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grandhotel Lienz
address: Fanny Wibmer Pedit Straße 2, 9900 Lienz, Tirol
description: This luxury 5-star hotel offers an exclusive ambience in the heart of the picturesque town of Lienz in East Tyrol, surrounded by the scenic mountains of the Lienz Dolomites. Guests benefit from a large spa area and a gourmet restaurant. The spacious, luxuriously furnished rooms and suites at Grandhotel Lienz Business-Wellness & Gourmet offer mountain or river views, a private lounge, a flat-screen TV, and an elegant bathroom. Free WiFi is provided in all rooms. The 1,400 m² spa area at the Lienz Grandhotel includes the exclusive Private Spa and the Medical Wellness Centre, which offers highly efficient wellness programmes for nutrition, vitality and a healthy lifestyle. A wide range of individually adjusted spa and beauty treatments is also available. The Orangerie restaurant offers international dishes with regional ingredients. Drinks can be enjoyed on the sun terrace overlooking the Isel River. The well-assorted wine cellar offers a unique selection of wines from all over the world.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Linz
description: An invigorating experience awaits you. Our award-winning, environmentally-conscious hotel is adjacent to the Design Center Linz and a short distance from the extraordinary architecture, shopping and dining in Linz's city center. Stay fit in our premium hotel's on-site fitness center, then ease into sublime relaxation in our sauna and steam bath. Satisfy your craving at Kitchen & Bar at Courtyard, serving a wide range of innovative cocktails and fresh, seasonal cuisine incorporating the traditional flavors of Linz. Our hotel's versatile venues are complemented by ample parking facilities, cutting-edge audiovisual technology, and professional planning services. Newly renovated, stylish hotel rooms provide all of the comforts of home, with featherbed mattresses, ergonomic chairs, high-speed Wi-Fi and floor-to-ceiling windows. Book one of our Junior Suites, which include a convenient sofa bed and enough room for everyone. Let us treat you to the legendary hospitality of Upper Austria at Courtyard Linz.Marriott

name: Gasthof Maxlhaid
description: Just 1 km from the Wels-Ost exit of the A25 motorway and 5 km from the centre of Wels and the fairgrounds, Gasthof Maxlhaid offers free WiFi and free private parking. The restaurant has a terrace and serves traditional Austrian cuisine from Monday to Friday. The bright rooms at the Maxlhaid Gasthof feature a flat-screen cable TV and a bathroom. The garden includes a children’s playground, and bicycles are provided free of charge. A railway museum is right next door. Linz Airport is 13 km away and an airport shuttle can be requested. The centre of Linz can be reached within a 30-minute drive.

name: Hotel Sandwirth
description: This traditional 4-star hotel in a neo-classical building in the centre of Klagenfurt is only 200 metres from the pedestrian zone and the Lindwurm Statue. Access to the relaxation zone with a sauna and gym equipment is free. The modern rooms at Hotel Sandwirth feature a classic design, air conditioning, a minibar and a flat-screen satellite TV with Sky TV channels. WiFi is available in all areas for free. Café Sandwirth serves snacks and lunch dishes, homemade pastries, and a large selection of drinks. It features a library, a cafe lounge, and outdoor seating from spring to autumn. A rich breakfast buffet with regional, homemade products is served every morning. In summer, it can be enjoyed on the roof terrace. Guests benefit from a free internet terminal in the lobby. Massages are available on request. A public car park is 100 metres from the property. Lake Wörthersee is 4.2 km away.

name: Cesta Grand Aktivhotel & Spa
description: CESTA GRAND - Aktivhotel & Spa is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Bad Gastein. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fireplace, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage are on the list of things guests can enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, linens, locker, mirror. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. CESTA GRAND - Aktivhotel & Spa combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Bad Gastein unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Alpenpark Resort Superior
description: The 4-star superior Alpenpark Resort is located in the centre of Seefeld in Tyrol and features a family spa with a hot tub, an outdoor pool, and a water park with 3 slides. The Alpenpark offers a games area, a baby club with child-care services 5 days a week, an activities club for children, children's and baby buffets, a separate dining room for kids, and a garden with playground, bouncing castle and a trampoline. Prams, baby bathtubs, bottle warmers, high chairs and baby phones are provided. Tyrolean and international cuisine, as well as a varied breakfast buffet, can be enjoyed in the restaurant. Half-board includes breakfast and dinner. You can park your car for free on site. An underground car park is available at an additional cost and on prior reservation.

name: Manni Das Hotel
description: Spend an unforgettable holiday in MANNI das Hotel in Mayrhofen in the Ziller Valley, offering ideal conditions for active vacations in every season. Featuring an exclusive country-house style with many traditional elements, the hotel is centrally located in Mayrhofen’s pedestrian zone, close to the hiking and cycling trails and the ski lifts. The ski bus to Hintertux departs directly outside the hotel. Enjoy a pleasant atmosphere, international ambience, excellent cuisine and top-quality wines at the family-run MANNI das Hotel. The stylish and elegant rooms are comfortably and tastefully furnished. An eventful day in the Zillertal Alps comes to a perfect end in the light-flooded, spacious and modern spa area with pool on the roof of MANNI das Hotel.

name: Hotel Salzburger Hof
description: Only steps away from the ski lifts, Bad Gastein’s thermal spa and the town centre, the Salzburger Hof offers panoramic views of the surrounding mountains. It features 2 spa areas with an indoor pool, hot tub, saunas and 3 sun terraces. Massage treatments and aqua gymnastics are available. The Salzburger Hof also has a playroom, bars and restaurants. Built between 1889 and 1907, Hotel Salzburger Hof provides elegant rooms with Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV, a DVD player, and a bathroom with bathrobes and hairdryer. Guests can enjoy traditional Austrian cuisine in the Hofkeller restaurant, while a wide range of cocktails and other drinks is available at the Ritz bar.

name: Alpenlove - Adult Spa Hotel
description: The Alpenhotel.fall in Love is situated in the centre of Seefeld, offering wellness and medical facilities at 1,200 metres above sea level. Underground parking is available at a surcharge, and free WiFi is available. The panoramic Black Crystal spa area covers 2,300m² and offers a variety of spa and therapeutic facilities including beauty treatments, an indoor swimming pool, a relaxation room, a sun terrace, and a fitness room. A sauna and a Roman steam bath will warm you on cold days. The spacious rooms of the Alpenhotel.fall in Love all come with a balcony, a safe, a hairdryer, and a make-up mirror. The rooms are furnished either in modern or traditional style. International specialties and Tyrolean delicacies, fine wines and elaborate deserts are served in the restaurant. The Dark Temptation restaurant and bar offers evening entertainment with music and dancing.

name: Bergresort Seefeld
description: Quietly located close to the centre of Seefeld, this 4-star superior hotel is surrounded by a 15,000 m² garden with beautiful mountain views. Bergresort Seefeld offers a 1,400 m² spa and wellness area with a sauna area, a Kneipp basin, an indoor pool, and a heated outdoor pool. The garden also features a natural swimming pond. The in-house fitness room is equipped with state-of-the-art exercise equipment. Bergresort Seefeld also offers a gourmet restaurant with a vinotheque. Parking is available free of charge.

name: Hotel Sonne 4 Sterne Superior
description: Featuring an indoor pool and a spa area, the Activ Hotel & Spa Sonne 4 Sterne Superior enjoys a quiet location amid the Kitzbühel Alps, a 5-minute walk from Kirchberg's centre. Guests can ski down to the property. All of the spacious rooms a the Hotel & Spa Sonne 4 Sterne Superior feature carpeted floors, satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box is provided in each accommodation unit. The hotel also offers a penthouse apartment in the town centre, around 1 km away. A rich buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the morning and the restaurant serves a wide range of Tyrolean specialities and international cuisine. Spa facilities include a Finnish sauna, an infra-red cabin, and a steam grotto. Famous Kitzbühel is just 6 km away.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Panoramahaus Dornbirn
description: Stylish, uncomplicated, refreshing: that’s the Four Points by Sheraton Panoramahaus Hotel Dornbirn. Our team welcomes you to our location high above the city, with a view of the mountains, 162 comfortable rooms and suites, free Wi-Fi, the wellness, fitness and Spa and all the extras which make for a perfect trip. Whether you plan a stroll through the city or a hike in the mountains, a meeting in Dornbirn or a holiday with friends – you’ll find just what you need at our hotel in Vorarlberg.Marriott

name: Das Kaltschmid - Familotel Tirol
description: Located in the pedestrian zone in the centre of Seefeld, DAS Kaltschmid features 2 gourmet restaurants and a large spa area. The indoor pool offers panoramic mountain views. DAS Kaltschmid offers free private parking. Spa facilities include saunas, a steam bath, and a hot tub. There is also a modern gym. Table tennis and billiards can be played at DAS Kaltschmid Since December 2017, The Happy Club kid's club includes extra benefits for children: breakfast, lunch at the Happy Club, cake/ice cream in restaurant "Am Kurpark", dinner and soft drinks, Child care 6 days a week at least 50 hours and Happy performances 6 times a week, Happy SPA with baby pool and children's pool with water slide, There are live music and dance evenings.

name: Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel
description: Directly connected to the Römertherme Spa via a private covered pathway, Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel is a protected historic building that was once a residence of Beethoven. Free WiFi is available on site. The spacious, individually decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bathrobes are at guests' disposal. The rooms and the public areas feature Art Nouveau elements. Guests of the Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel can also relax in the lounge which features an original glass roof.

name: Valluga Hotel
address: Arlbergstraße 79, Sankt Anton am Arlberg, Tirol
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the centre of Sankt Anton am Arlberg and the ski area, Valluga Hotel offers a free ski shuttle to the cable cars, free access to the large spa centre, and a restaurant and bar. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. The spa centre includes 4 saunas and thermal showers, a large indoor pool, 2 massage and treatment rooms, a relaxation room with water beds, and a fitness room with Technogym equipment. Guests of the Valluga can start their day with a rich buffet breakfast. international and Mediterranean cuisine is available for dinner in the on-site restaurant Valluga Hotel is right next to a ski bus stop, and cross-country ski trails and a toboggan track can be easily reached from there. The ski storage room comes with a ski boot dryer. The surrounding is ideal for hiking and cycling, and during summer, guided hiking tours are offered free of charge. Bike rental can be organised by the hotel. Private parking is possible for free.

name: Hotel Saalbacher Hof
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the pedestrian zone of Saalbach, only 50 metres from the ski lifts. It has a large spa area with an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. The Saalbacher Hof’s rooms are furnished in an elegant country style and feature cable TV and a bathroom with bathrobes and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony. The spa area features an indoor pool with a waterfall, 3 saunas, and a relaxation room with water beds. The garden offers panoramic views over Saalbach. The garden offers panoramic views and an outdoor pool. Each week, different courses like herbal salt production, green smoothie workshop, meditation classes, and more are offered. The restaurant serves classic Salzburg cuisine and international dishes, as well as fine wines. The Saalbacher Hof offers daily free admission to its après ski bar and nightclub Castello, with live music (from mid of January) and DJs. A Silvester Gala Dinner is available on 31 December upon prior reservation and at an additional cost. Ski passes are available at the reception. Guests of the Saalbacher Hof receive a 10% reduction at all ski rentals in Saalbach.

name: Johannesbad Hotel Palace
description: Just a few minutes’ walk away from the centre of Bad Hofgastein, Johannesbad Hotel Palace - Kinder bis 11 kostenfrei offers an extensive health and beauty programme. Surrounded by a unique natural landscape, the hotel is an oasis of tranquillity and relaxation. The 30,000 m² hotel park has a terrace and walking trails. Let yourself be pampered in the beauty farm, enjoy a thermal bath and a relaxing massage, or play some tennis. Comfortable rooms with beautiful mountain views, a bar with live music, an elegant lobby with open fireplace and an indoor tennis centre with 2 carpet courts and direct access from the hotel await you. The spacious spa area of the Johannesbad Hotel Palace - Kinder bis 11 kostenfrei features a panoramic indoor pool, a herbal sauna, a steam bath and much more. Medical treatments include thermal baths and fango.

name: Hotel Penz West
description: This modern and elegant 4-star hotel is only 4 km from the city centre, right next to Innsbruck Airport and the A12 motorway. Hotel Penz West offers free WiFi, free parking, and a top-floor spa area offering panoramic mountain views. The spa area can be used free of charge and features a Finnish sauna, a steam bath, an infrared cabin, and a modern gym. Bathrobes are provided for free. The spacious rooms at Penz West offer satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. Most rooms have a marble bathroom and parquet flooring. The restaurant has varying opening hours, please check with the property direct. It features a winter garten and serves regional and international cuisine, as well as a daily breakfast buffet. A small breakfast for early risers is available from 05:00. A free internet terminal is available in Hotel Penz West’s lobby.

name: Binders Budget City Mountain Hotel
description: Apartment / apartment: This spacious attic loft offers panoramic views over Innsbruck. It has high ceilings, a bathtub, a waterbed and glass walls with no walls or doors. Please note that the room is only accessible via a spiral staircase from The BinderS is located in a quiet location in the middle of Innsbruck, the alpine sports town in the Tyrolean mountains. 49 sensationally furnished rooms are waiting for you and your visit. The hotel was rebuilt for you in 2019 and is now named BinderS Budget City Mountain Hotel. Breakfast from the buffet can be booked for € 15,00 per person and day. Important note: From 06. 01. to 07. 04. 2019 renovations and renovations are done in the house. We apologize for any inconvenience.  Parking: Weekends on the street free of charge from Monday to Friday between 09:00 - 19:00 is the toll Parkstraße (€ 0.70 / 30 minutes or € 7, - / day). By reservation you can park your car in our hotel garage for € 15, - per night. Motorbikes and bicycles park free of charge in our garage. NEW Free parking for electric cars in our hotel garage incl. Charging stations (please call in advance). Wireless internet available throughout the houseVRBO

name: Thermenhotel Karawankenhof
description: This modern 4-star hotel in Warmbad Villach is directly connected to the Kärnten Therme thermal spa, which offers free admission to guests. The spacious rooms and apartments are air-conditioned and have a balcony or terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available. Thermenhotel Karawankenhof’s bright and elegant rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, a safe, and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. A spa bag with bathrobes, slippers and towels is provided. Apartments also have a kitchen. The restaurant serves dishes from the Alps and the Adriatic region. Children can spend their time in the Croco Club under the supervision of the experienced entertainment staff. The garden includes a sun terrace, and free private parking is available on site. Guests of the Karawankenhof can access the Kärnten Therme daily from 08:00 in the morning, which is 1 hour before it is opened to the public. This includes an indoor pool, a heated outdoor pool, and a wide range of saunas, hot tubs and steam baths. There is also a direct connection to the health therapy section. Guests arriving with children can borrow free of charge equipment such as baby monitor, buggy, bottle warmer and baby backpack. Those with a business schedule have conference facilities at their disposal. Hiking and cycling trails, as well as cross-country ski runs, start at the doorstep. The centre of Villach is just a 5-minute drive or bus ride away. Lake Wörth is a 15-minute drive away, and in winter, the Gerlitzen Ski Area can be reached in a 30-minute drive.

name: Hotel Maxlhaid
description: Situated on the eastern outskirts of Wels, Hotel Maxlhaid provides rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen cable TV. The on-site restaurant serves Austrian cuisine and seasonal specialities. The centre of Wels is 5 km away. The modern Maxlhaid rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature a bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower or a bathtub. The junior suite is fitted with a sofa bed and a fridge. During summer, you can also dine on the hotel’s terrace or relax in the on-site garden. Drinks are offered at the bar and each day, you can enjoy a freshly prepared breakfast buffet at Hotel Maxlhaid. Vending machines are provided in the hotel. Linz Airport is 13 km away and an airport shuttle can be requested. Bicycles can be borrowed on site and private parking is available free of charge. The centre of Linz can be reached within a 30-minute drive.

name: Zillergrundrock Luxury Mountain Resort
description: Set in Mayrhofen, 1.5 km from Congress Zillertal - Europahaus Mayrhofen, ZillergrundRock Luxury Mountain Resort offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities are a bar, a shared lounge, as well as a garden. The accommodation provides an indoor pool, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms. The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At ZillergrundRock Luxury Mountain every room includes a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. ZillergrundRock Luxury Mountain Resort offers 4-star accommodation with a spa centre and children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mayrhofen, like skiing and cycling. Mayrhofen is 1.6 km from ZillergrundRock Luxury Mountain, while Vans Penken Park is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Innsbruck Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Pichlmayrgut
description: Located in Pichl in the Enns Valley, this 4-star resort hotel offers gourmet cuisine, tennis and squash courts, and a 3,000 m² spa area. A free shuttle takes guests to the Reiteralm Cable Car, just 500 metres away. The Pichlmayrgut’s spa area includes an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, a hot tub, various saunas and steam baths, and a gym. A wide range of massage and beauty treatments is offered. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas. The spacious, colourfully decorated rooms at Hotel Pichlmayrgut feature satellite TV, a minibar, and a bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Free wired internet access is available in all rooms. A buffet breakfast is offered and half-board additionally includes a 6-course dinner featuring Austrian and international dishes. Many products come from the hotel’s own organic farm. A large selection of fine wines is on offer. In summer, guided hikes are offered regularly, and bicycles can be hired for free. In winter, guests can buy ski passes on site. From May to October, guests can enjoy the grenzen.los.aktiv! programme of the Pichlmayrgut. This programme includes several special offers in the the whole region

name: Hotel Norica Therme
description: Located in the pedestrian zone in the centre of Bad Hofgastein, the 4-star superior Hotel Norica is directly connected to the Alpentherme Thermal Spa and offers free and unlimited access to it. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at the Norica Hotel feature an HD flat-screen cable TV, a seating area, a safe, and a bathroom with a hairdryer, make-up mirror, and free toiletries. Bathrobes and bathing towels are provided free of charge for use in the spa. Typical Salzburg dishes and international cuisine are served in Hotel Norica’s restaurant and the Blue Salon offers homemade Austrian pastries and coffee specialities. Beverages are available throughout the day at the bar or in the lounge that boasts a fireplace. Guests can attend a wine tasting in the wine cellar once a week. The in-house 1,500 m² Celtic Spa comprises an indoor pool with massage jets, different saunas, an infrared cabin, a sole steam cabin, showers with ice crushers, radon bath tubs, and relaxation areas. Special Celtic treatments are also offered. For the length of the stay, guests are also provided free and unlimited entrance to the Alpentherme Thermal Spa.
