An air-conditioned congress room with technical equipment can be used free of charge. Guests can use a ski storage with ski boot dryer. A free ski bus stops right next to the hotel.

name: Inntaler Hof
description: A short distance from skiing, cycling, and more, this family-friendly vacation home lets you experience it all. There's convenient covered onsite parking, so you can leave your vehicle behind and head out to Seefeld Ski Area and Peace Bell in the Alpes, just a short walk away. Relax by the communal pool or sip a drink in the garden of this 753-sq-ft vacation home, which also features a porch or lanai and a fitness center. For a change of scenery, come inside and try your hand at table tennis, or enjoy the Internet, cable/satellite TV, and stereo. As you settle into this 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a BBQ grill and a fireplace. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer and towels. The kitchen is stocked with a refrigerator. And you can even travel light because you'll have a dryer.VRBO

name: Hotel Latini
description: The Hotel Latini enjoys a quiet location in the mountain and lakeside landscape around Lake Zell, and offers you fine cuisine, a swimming pool and free parking in a garage. Choose from double rooms and junior suites with light wood panelling, partly featuring balconies or French balconies with superb views.Wired and wireless internet is available free of charge. Culinary highlights include international and Pinzgau specialities in the various restaurants of the Latini hotel and in the pizzeria.The rich buffet breakfast is included in the room rate. A diverse programme of leisure activities and a large wellness area make the Hotel Latini's offer complete. Hotel Latini is located in the Schüttdorf quarter of Zell am See. The Areitbahn, taking you into a hiking and skiing paradise at the Schmittenhöhe, can be reached within 2 minutes. The landscape around the town boasts beautiful mountain summits, lush meadows and the deep blue waters of Lake Zell. It is also an ideal starting point for excursions to the Grossglockner High Alpine Road, the city of Salzburg and the Eisriesenwelt ice caves in Werfen to name just a few. From mid-May to mid-October, the Zell am See-Kaprun Card is included in the rate. This card offers many free benefits and discounts, including free use of local cable cars and buses.

name: Parkhotel Graz
description: Parkhotel Graz - Traditional Luxury is located in the centre of Graz and features a gourmet restaurant, free WiFi, a garden and a spacious car park. All stylish rooms feature all necessities for a comfortable stay. They include elegant bathrooms, air conditioning, telephones, and many other amenities. Guests can use the spa facilities including a swimming pool, two saunas and a fitness centre free of charge. The on-site restaurant is renowned for its excellent, regional cuisine and wine cellar. Guests of the Parkhotel Graz - Traditional Luxury can also enjoy the FLORA BAR, the Winter Garden Café and the rose garden in summer. Parkhotel Graz - Traditional Luxury is situated in the historical city centre, with the Stadtpark around the corner. Close by is the Opera House, the Schauspielhaus and the beautiful cathedral. The new Kunsthaus is within easy walking distance, as is the Schlossberg Mountain and the most important museums. The Parkhotel Graz - Traditional Luxury is 10 km from the Graz Airport.

name: Schlosshotel Ischgl
description: Located directly next to the ski slopes of Ischgl, the 5-star superior Schlosshotel Ischgl 5-Sterne Superior offers elegant and spacious rooms, free WiFi, a private ski shop with ski hire, free private parking, an extensive spa area and various à la carte restaurants. The rooms are equipped with timeless and elegant furniture designed by the Italian design label Minotti. All rooms come with a balcony, phone, radio, flat-screen TV with 125 channels, minibar, safe and a Nespresso machine. The Schlossherrnstube Restaurant was awarded 18 points / 4 toques by the Gault Millau gourmet guide. Traditional Austrian cuisine and the finest pizza is served in the Weinstube which was awarded 12 points and 1 toque. Half-board guests can enjoy a 5-course dinner in the hotel's Kristallsaal. Access to the state-of-the-art SCHLOSS SPA is free-of-charge for guests. Guests can benefit from an indoor pool, Finnish sauna, herbal sauna, aroma steam bath, infrared chairs, water beds, a horizontal shower, tea bar and a fitness studio. The Schlosslounge serves extraordinary drinks as well as exquisite types of champagne. The champagne club is famous for its relaxed atmosphere and some of Europe's best DJs.

name: Alte Post Wellness & Thermalhotel
description: This family-run hotel is located right in the pedestrianized centre of Bad Hofgastein. It features a modern spa area including a thermal outdoor pool, and offers free parking. The Schlossalm Cable Car can be reached within 5 minutes by the free shuttle bus. The Alpentherme spa and the spa parks can reached within a 2-minute walk from the ALTE POST Gastein - Alpine Boutique Hotel & Spa. An 18-hole golf course is just 5 km away. All rooms have a balcony and you can find bathrobes in each of them. The wellness facilities of the Alte Post hotel include a hot tub, a steam bath, a sauna and a sun bed. A fitness area and various wellness treatments are at your disposal. The thermal outdoor pool also has an indoor access and is heated to 33 °C the whole year. For dinner, you can enjoy a 4-course menu and select from the salad buffet. The restaurant offers regional and international cuisine.

name: Dormio Resort Obertraun
description: No description found

name: Hotel Leonhard
description: The 4-star Hotel Leonhard is situated 500 metres from the gondola to the Saalbach-Hinterglemm Leogang Fieberbrunn ski area and in winter a transfer bus to the Asitz valley station leaves in front of the hotel and is free of charge. Free WiFi is available. All rooms feature cable TV and a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. The rooms also feature a balcony or a terrace, providing panoramic mountain views of the surrounding Alpine landscape. For late risers, Hotel Leonhard provides breakfast in bed. You can treat yourself to a tasty meal in the hotel restaurant, followed by a drink at the bar. In summer you can enjoy the views of the mountains while hiking or make excursions to various surrounding sites. There are 2 modern conference rooms, one of which is suitable for up to 100 people and one for 20 people.

name: Henri Country House Seefeld
description: Located in Seefeld in Tirol, 100 metres from Casino Seefeld, HENRI Country House Seefeld provides accommodation with free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. A terrace, an on-site snack bar and shared lounge are available. At the hotel, each room has a desk, a balcony with a mountain view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box and selected rooms are fitted with garden views. At HENRI Country House Seefeld, all rooms come with a seating area. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. The guests can relax in the wellness area, including a hammam and a sauna, or in the garden. Guests at HENRI Country House Seefeld will be able to enjoy activities in and around Seefeld in Tirol, like hiking, skiing and cycling. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Olympia Sports and Congress Centre, Seekirchl Church and Toni-Seelos-Olympiaschanze. The nearest airport is Innsbruck Airport, 15 km from HENRI Country House Seefeld. During the winter season (7.12.2022 to 15.03.2023) the use of the cross-country skiing trails as well as the regional buses of the municipality Seefeld is included in the room rate.

name: Der Löwe - Lebe Frei
description: Der Loewe - Your Hotel for more enjoyment in lifeLocated in the quite village center of Leogang, the 4 star Hotel Der Loewe offers a familiar and relaxing atmosphere. Fine cuisine ( la carte or Gourmet halfboard), comfortable rooms, Family Appartements and Suites with open fire place and private sauna, Family Spa with indoor- and outdoor pool, separate Spa only for adults with massage, Beauty treatments, sauna with mountain view etc. and free WIFI. In summer there will be a free ride with the cable car every day. You can hike, bike or play golf and in winter the hotel offers free shuttle service directly to the biggest skiarea in Austria - the Skicircus Saalbach Hinterglemm Leogang Fieberbrunn.iHotelier/iStay

name: Elisabethhotel Premium Private Retreat
description: Situated in the centre of Mayrhofen, the newly renovated 4-star superior adult-only ElisabethHotel Premium Private Retreat is a 5-minute walk from the Zillertal 3000 Ski Area. The 1,400 m² spa area includes a sauna, steam bath, and 17-metre indoor pool. The rooms are decorated in modern and elegant Tyrolean style and feature a balcony, a flat-screen TV, a seating area, and a spacious bathroom with bathtub or shower. Slippers and bathrobes are also provided. The ElisabethHotel has a bar with an open fireplace and a restaurant serving local specialities. Buffets and candle-lit dinners with piano music are organised every week. A 5-course menu with salad buffet and a variety of cheese, as well as an afternoon snack are available. Guests can relax on the sun terrace and choose from a selection of beauty treatments. A fitness centre is also on site.

name: Johann Schladming
description: The newly renovated JOHANN Schladming is located right on the main square and only 250 meters from the Planai valley station. The Hotel has a bar, a award winning restaurant, a wellness area, a gym and free private parking. The property also features free WiFi, wooden floors, a rain shower, USB charging socket, ergonomic sleeping system with high-quality bed linen and a minibar as standard in every room. Guests at JOHANN Schladming will be able to enjoy activities in and around Schladming, like hiking, skiing and cycling. Schladming - 4 Berge Skischaukel is 250 meters away from the hotel and ski passes can be purchased at the font desk. The property offers during the summer months the 'Sommercard' with free use of amenities, such a cable cars, toll roads and free visits to public lakes and swimming pools. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart, 90 km from JOHANN Schladming.

name: Best Western Plaza Hotel Wels
description: The Best Western Plaza Hotel Wels is the perfect solution for your stay. The hotel is directly located in the heart of Wels, only two minutes to walk to the old town of Wels. Near the hotel you also find the Messe Wels, one of the biggest exhibition areas in Upper Austria. The hotel offers free high-speed Internet access in all guest rooms and also W-LAN in public areas. The hotel offers four modern meeting rooms with all equipment needed and professional and friendly staff, they will take care of your well-being. If you have got time to relax, you can visit our wellness area on the second floor. The hotel offers you a restaurant called Steaks, which serves international and typical Austrian food for lunch and dinner. We would be very delighted to welcome you in our Best Western Plaza Hotel Wels. Short Facts of the Best Western Plaza Hotel Wels, there are 107 design rooms with bathtub or shower/toilet, mini-bar, flat screen, vanity mirror, hair dryer and safe. There is free high-speed WLAN in all areas. The wellness area has a finish sauna, steam bath, whirlpools and an external patio. For your convenience the hotel has a bar and restaurant. If you are here on business the Best Western Plaza Hotel Wels has four conference and banquet rooms for up to 250 people with modern technology and roof terrace. The city tax of EUR 1.00 per person, per night is included in the room rate.bestwestern.com

name: Das Falkenstein
description: In a quiet location at the foot of Kitzsteinhorn, just a 10-minute walk from the centre of Kaprun, Das Falkenstein features a large spa area, an indoor pool, and free WiFi. Free private parking is available. Spa facilities include a steam bath, sauna, and sun bed. A large, modern fitness room is available, and guests can enjoy massages and beauty treatments. The indoor pool has an integrated hot tub and a counter-current system. The spacious rooms all feature a balcony, traditional wooden furniture, cable TV, and a bathroom. Das Falkenstein serves an extensive breakfast buffet with fresh juices and fruits, homemade bread, and fresh organic eggs from the hotel's own chickens. In the evening, guests can enjoy a 4-course dinner that changes daily. The hotel also has a games room with a billiards table and darts. There are children’s videos and an outdoor playground for the younger guests. The bus to the Kitzsteinhorn Cable Car stops 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Natur & Spa Resort Der Alpbacherhof
description: In a quiet location in the heart of the Alpbach Valley, the Alpbacherhof offers panoramic views of the surrounding mountains, a 1,600 m² spa area with indoor pool, and a free shuttle bus that goes from 100 metres away to the nearby ski lifts. Guests of Alpbacherhof Mountain & Spa Resort can enjoy a wide range of fine dishes and refined wines at the hotel restaurant or end the evening with a cocktail or schnapps at the bar. Half-board includes a welcome drink, buffet breakfast, a lunch/afternoon snack with cake and soup, and 3 dinner options to choose from. Massages, bike rental and electric bike rental are available for an additional charge. A practice slope for beginners is only a short walk from the hotel. A yoga session is organised once a week on site. There is also a weekly leisure programme including guided walks, winter walks and snow shoe walks in winter. In summer, there are guided electric bike tours with the hotel walking guide that are exclusively for resort guests. A wide variety of sports and leisure options is available in the hotel’s surroundings in every season. The historic town of Rattenberg is only 10 km away. All guests receive the Alpbachtal Card free of charge, which comprises many free benefits in the region, such as free admission to all swimming lakes and free use of buses and cable cars in the surrounding area.

name: St Georg
description: This stylish country hotel enjoys a very quiet location close to the centre of Zell am See and only 300 metres away from the City Express Cable Car. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. You can enjoy fine Austrian cuisine in the restaurant and selected drinks in the bar. Hotel St. Georg offers elegant rooms and suites in the individual ambience of a Salzburg country estate. The spa area consists of an indoor pool with counter current system, a Finnish sauna, a bio sauna, an infrared cabin, and a sun bed and massages (both available at an additional cost). The restaurant also features a wine cellar and a vinotheque. In summer you can also have breakfast on the sunny terrace. The restaurant is open in winter. In summer guests can reach surrounding restaurants on foot. Hotel St. Georg offers a green fee reduction of 30% at the nearby golf course.

name: Hotel Dreisonnen
description: This family-friendly 4-star-superior hotel is located in the heart of Serfaus. All rooms have balconies and it offers an indoor pool, fine cuisine, free Wi-Fi and free parking. Within a 10-minute walk or a short subway ride, you can reach the Komperdell Cable Car into the Serfaus-Fiss-Ladis Ski Area from the Hotel DreiSonnen. The village of Serfaus provides lots of activities and facilities for kids, like the groundhog trail, a playroom and adventure hiking paths for the entire family. A fitness room, a swimming pool with a counter-current facility and massage jets, a sunny terrace, a sauna and steam bath area are also available on site. There is a relax area and a tea bar. Children enjoy a games room and the kid's club. Full board includes a buffet breakfast with organic products and freshly prepared eggs any style, various snacks for lunch, an afternoon buffet with soups, salads and pastries and fine Tyrolean cuisine for dinner. Children can have their dinner under professional supervision at the kids' table.

name: The Crystal Vaya Unique
description: The 4-star-superior hotel The Crystal VAYA Unique is located in Obergurgl in the Ötztal Alps. Rooms feature large windows and balconies, and some offer mountain views. The cuisine mixes tradition and modernity. The Crystal VAYA Unique offers direct access to the Obergurgl/Hochgurgl ski area. Here you will find 110 km of slopes between 1,800 and 3,080 metres above sea level, 12 km of winter hiking trails, après ski bars and mountain huts.

name: Wellnesshotel Schönruh - Adults only
description: Rooms Stay in one of 101 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and ski storage. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you a stay at Wellnesshotel Schönruh - Adults Only in Seefeld in Tirol, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 5-minute walk of Seefeld Ski Area and Golfacadamy Seefeld. This 4-star hotel is 19.8 mi (31.9 km) from Garmisch-Partenkirchen Ski Resort and 0.6 mi (0.9 km) from Rosshuette Cable Car. Dining Satisfy your appetite for dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations This property is closed from October 15 2023 to December 22 2023 (dates subject to change). The property is closed between March 26 and May 17. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 3.50 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 15 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: Puradies
description: The Puradies is a 4-star superior hotel in a scenic location in Leogang, a 5-minute walk from the Asitzbahn Cable Car. Guests can relax in a natural swimming pond and a spa area, and on the sun terrace. The Puradies offers direct access to the slopes of the Saalbach-Hinterglemm-Leogang-Fieberbrunn Ski Area. Puradies consists of a renovated historic hotel building, 2 new hotel buildings and several chalets. Free WiFi is available. A ski storage room is available, and ski passes can be bought on site. The hotel offers access to the 720 km long mountain bike road. Guests staying in a room or suite enjoy a half-board arrangement, while chalet guests can enjoy a breakfast served to the chalet. For these guests, half-board is available at an additional cost, and can be enjoyed either in the chalet or in the restaurant. The rooms and chalets are furnished in a modern Alpine style and feature mountain views, a flat-screen TV, a seating area, and a bathroom. Chalets additionally feature a kitchen, a tiled stove, a private sauna and infrared cabin, and a terrace. NEW: Heavenly moments in the extended Heaven Spa Look forward to 1.500m² of our oasis of wellbeing: • new water experiences for young and old • even more peace and quiet, cozy beds and time to relax • deep rest and relaxation in the adults only sauna house • more space for movement in the new Fitness Center and the yoga studio • reopening of the Ess:enz restaurant with a brand new concept Half-board includes a breakfast buffet, an afternoon snack, and a 4-course dinner with a choice of dishes. Free private parking is available on site. The centre of Leogang, with many shops and restaurants, is 3 km away, and Salzburg Airport is 75 km away.

name: Im Weissen Rössl am Wolfgangsee
address: Markt 74, 5360 Sankt Wolfgang im Salzkammergut, Oberosterreich
description: Located right on the shore of Lake Wolfgang, this 4-star superior hotel offers panoramic lake and mountain views, 2 restaurants, and a unique spa area with a heated lakeside pool. The 1,500 m² spa includes a floating hot tub, a steam bath, a large sun terrace, a fitness room, and a relaxation room with panoramic views. A wide range of beauty and massage treatments is also available at the Weißes Rössl Hotel. The traditionally furnished rooms at the Weißes Rössl offer satellite TV, a bathroom with hairdryer, and free internet access via modem. The rooms are located in 9 historic buildings in the centre of St. Wolfgang. The Seerestaurant serves traditional Austrian specialities. At the Romantikrestaurant Kaiserterrasse, which was awarded one toque by Gault Millau, guests can enjoy gourmet cuisine and exclusive Austrian wines. Both restaurants feature a scenic view of Lake Wolfgang. Guests of the Romantikhotel Im Weißen Rössl benefit from reduced green fees at the Salzkammergut Golf Club. Píck-up from Salzburg Airport or Salzburg Main Train Station is available on request.

name: Hotel Gluecksschmiede
description: Dorfhotel Glücksschmiede is located directly in the centre of Hinterglemm, only 100 metres away from the Reiterkogelbahn Cable Car and right next to the slopes of the Saalbach-Hinterglemm-Leogang-Fieberbrunn Ski Area. It offers a spa area, free WiFI and a choice of 2 a-la-carte Restaurants for lunch and dinner. The spacious Almdorf spa area can be used free of charge and features an indoor pool, a Finnish sauna, a bio sauna, a steam bath, and a children’s pool. Massages are also available. Guests can enjoy their meals either in the rustic and traditional "Fuhrmannsstube" or the steak and grill Restaurant "Horn Ox". In winter, the Dorfhotel Glücksschmiede has a cooperation with a ski and snowboard school. Ski passes are available at the reception, and overnight ski service is available. A flood-lit night ski run is right behind the hotel. In summer, there is a daily sports programm featuring a wide range of activities, including mountain bike tours, hikes with certified guides, canyoning and rafting. The Joker Card is included in summer and offers many free benefits and discounts, including free use of local cable cars.

name: Hotel Blü Gastein
address: Kaiser Franz Platz 1, 5630 Bad Hofgastein, Salzburg
description: This hotel is located on a prominent square in the centre of Hofgastein. It is an ideal base for exploring the Gastein Valley. Reopening in December 2020 after an extensive redesign in the public areas. The hotel also offers modern rooms in a new wing called the tree house. The BLÜ-Bar faces directly the Kaiser Franz Platz and is the perfect meeting point for after-work drinks, fine jazz concerts and parties. The BLÜ-Restaurant is open all day and serves a wide variety of regional and international dishes. The Himmelblü Spa on the roof offers a yoga room with mountain views, 2 saunas, a relaxation area and a roof garden. There is also a small fitness area, a library, a seminar room and a storage area for bicycles and ski equipment. Free parking spaces are available for guests. The ski bus also stops in front of the building.

name: Burg Vital Resort
description: The 5 star superior Burg Vital Resort is situated a few minutes walk from the Petersbodenbahn Cable Car Station of the Lech-Zürs skiing area. It features a spacious spa area with an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, a steam cabin and a relaxation room. The spacious, modern rooms come with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a seating area, a minibar, a safe, and a private bathroom with shower or bath tub. Some rooms feature a balcony. The à la carte gourmet restaurants are awarded by Gault Millau. They serve Austrian and international culinary delights with selected products. Half-board includes a varied breakfast buffet and dinner with a choice of main dishes. Guests of Burg Vital Resort have access to a garden with a furnished terrace, outdoor pool and a playground for children. A fitness room is also available. Gourmet food products can be bought in a shop on site.

name: Vergeiner's Hotel Traube
description: Offering panoramic views of the Alps and Lienz, Vergeiner's Hotel Traube is located in the heart of the city. Family-run since 1860, this 4-star hotel features a top-floor spa area overlooking the mountains. Free WiFi is available. Austrian and international cuisine are served in the à la carte restaurant. The rich breakfast buffet is served in the breakfast room overlooking Lienz' main square.

name: Das Hotel Eden
description: Surrounded by a generously designed park landscape directly opposite Seefeld's pedestrian zone, Das Hotel Eden features a spacious spa area, a beauty centre, and free WiFi. The heated outdoor pool offers views of the surrounding mountains. Located amidst the scenic Tyrolean mountains, all rooms at the Hotel Eden feature a balcony and offer panoramic views. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free wired internet access. A notebook can also be rented at the reception. In summer the property rents E-Bikes at a surcharge. At the Seebach Restaurant, you can enjoy delicious meals, or try regional delicacies and wine from a well-assorted wine list at Adam’s Bistro Bar with live music. The half-board offer includes homemade cakes in the afternoon, a 5-course dinner, and once per week a theme dinner buffet.

name: Lebenberg Schlosshotel-Kitzbühel
description: High above Kitzbhel: Welcome to the Lebenberg- Schlosshotel Kitzbhel. The hotel is located at an height of approx. 762 m and has 150 luxurious rooms and suites.The highlight is the panorama wellness oasis.You can reach the center of Kitzbhel in about 10 minutes by walk.iHotelier/iStay

name: Neue Post
description: Only a 3-minute walk away from the Zeller Bergbahn cable car, which provides access to the Schmittenhöhe skiing and hiking area, Hotel Neue Post enjoys an exceptional location in the heart of the old town of Zell am See. Breakfast is available in the mornings and dining options include the Cäsar and the Basmati restaurants, both found 10 metres from the property. Groceries can be purchased in an Aydin shop 10 metres away, a Spar supermarket 50 metres off or a Billa one 80 metres from the property. This recently renovated and enlarged hotel is surrounded by a castle park and the hotel garden. It offers a hotel restaurant, a bar, a well-stocked grocery store, a lobby, a fireplace lounge, and a traditional wooden lounge. Free wireless LAN access is available in the public area and in most rooms. A parking garage is also available. The 1,000 m² spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, infrared and light therapy, a “shower temple”, oxygen therapy, and a relaxation room by the waterfall. The hotel also has a solarium, a fitness centre, and a big garden with a heated, glass-covered pool (open all year) and a sunbathing lawn. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The spacious and cosy rooms are equipped with many amenities. All rooms are non-smoking. Smoking is only allowed on the balconies or at the hotel bar. Leisure options at Hotel Neue Post include a library, video games, board games, tabletop football, and a big-screen TV with a projector. Lake Zell and the train station are also only a 3-minute walk away. The hotel is located at the beginning of Zell am See’s pedestrian zone.

name: Alpvita Piz Tasna
description: The Alpvita Piz Tasna enjoys a quiet location above the centre of Ischgl, which is only a 2-minute walk away. It offers a modern spa area, free Wi-Fi and free parking. Surrounded by the Silvretta and Verwall mountain ranges, you can easily reach the Silvretta Arena Ischgl-Samnaun ski area from the Alpvita Piz Tasna. It is just 150 metres to the next cable car and to the village tunnel featuring a moving walkway. The ski slope leads right past the hotel. The 400 m² spa area features several saunas sauna, an aroma steam bath and a pool. Additional facilities include hay beds, herbal baths and a relaxation room with a tea and soft drink bar. You can take advantage of the Alpvita's own taxi service, ski service and of the hotel's ski instructor. You can park your car during your stay in the garage, which is located in the village centre next to the tourist office (walking distance: 4 minutes). You will receive a parking card from us with which you can park for free. A large selection of wine, port wine, whiskey and cocktails are available at the Tyrolean-style bar of the Alpvita Piz Tasna. You can get the Silvretta Basic Card at the reception. This summer card is included in the room price and includes 1x daily: ascent and descent of the open cable cars and chairlifts in a location of your choice (excluding bike transport), as well as unlimited use of local public transport between Landeck, Zeinisjoch and Bielerhöhe (subject to toll).

name: Post Hotel
description: Located in the centre of See, 250 metres from the Bergbahnen See Cable Car, Post Hotel Paznaun offers free access to a sauna and a spa area, free WiFi access, and free parking on site. The spacious rooms at Post Hotel Paznaun are fitted with a balcony with mountain views, a flat-screen satellite TV, and a private bathroom with a bath or a shower and free toiletries. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast in the restaurant The hotel also features a bar, while the next restaurants and supermarkets are just 100 metres away. Further facilities at Post Hotel Paznaun include free ski storage and boot dryer. The ski bus stop is 100 metres from the building.

name: Falkensteiner Hotel Schladming
description: Modern architecture combined with regional natural materials, fresh Styrian cuisine and the cosy Acquapura Spa area provide a relaxed atmosphere at the Falkensteiner Hotel in Schladming. Located at the heart of gorgeous Schladminger Tauern and Dachstein Gletscher, hiking and mountain adventures are within reach at our hotel. Welcome Home to the first address in SchladmingiHotelier/iStay

name: Biohotel Rupertus
description: Situated right next to the Asitz Cable Car, the Leogang Bike Park and the slopes of the Saalbach-Hinterglemm-Leogang-Fieberbrunn Ski Area, Biohotel Rupertus offers a modern spa area, elegant rooms with free WiFi access, and a restaurant with a bar. Heated indoor & outdoor pool 21m long (open all year round). Relax bubble loungers in the indoor pool. Two new relaxation rooms. Spacious family sauna with sunbathing areas. Outdoor sauna 90°C with panoramic view and nudist terrace.plunge pool.sundeck. New gym The rooms feature wooden floors, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom with a hairdryer, make-up mirror, and high-quality toiletries. The Rupertus Bio-Hotel’s restaurant serves Austrian and Mediterranean cuisine, vegetarian and vegan dishes, and homemade pastries, all made from organic products. Half-board includes a 5-course dinner, a breakfast buffet, and an afternoon buffet with snacks and pastries. Free child care for children older than 3 years and many activities for children are offered. You can buy ski passes on site and store you ski equipment in a separate ski storage room. The ski and bicycle storage rooms are under video surveillance. An underground car park is available (reservations are recommended). Bicycle rental is provided as well, and an e-car is available on prior reservation. Cross-country ski runs are a 10-minute drive away, and the centre of Leogang is 3 km away. The 18-hole Maria Alm-Urslautal Golf Course is 10 km away and offers 30% green fee discounts. A free shuttle service from and to the Leogang, Saalfelden or Hochfilzen train stations is available. In summer, the Saalfelden-Leogang Card is included in the rate. This card includes many benefits and discounts in the region, including free use of the cable cars for your whole stay in winter (but without skis) and once per day in summer.

name: Q! Hotel Maria Theresia
description: The Q! Hotel Maria Theresia is located right in the centre of Kitzbühel, only a few steps away from the Hahnenkammbahn Cable Car. WiFi access is provided free of charge. The restaurant serves traditional Tyrolean cuisine as well as modern dishes. The half-board arrangement includes a 4-course dinner with a starter, soup, meat or vegetarian main course, and a dessert. In the morning, a varied breakfast buffet is offered. The Maria Theresia Hotel also has an elegant fireplace lounge with a bar. Spa facilities include various free saunas and a steam bath. A selection of beauty and massage treatments is available at an additional cost. The Golfclub Schwarzsee Golf Course is 4.6 km away and guests receive a 20% discount on the green fee. Golf packages as well as the Golf-Alpin Card are available on request at the hotel. The Golfclub Kaps is 1.4 km away, the Golfplatz Rasmushof Golf Course is within 1.1 km and the Golfplatz Eichenheim Golf Course is 2.7 km from the hotel. Many restaurants, bars and shops are very close, and the cable car to the Kitzbüheler Horn is also close by.

name: Hotel Sonnegg
description: Offering a heated outdoor pool and a spa area, this family-run hotel in the Glemm Valley, 3 km from the centre of Saalbach, is only 300 metres from the Schönleiten Cable Car and the access to the Saalbach-Hinterglemm-Leogang Ski Circus. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The spa area at Hotel Sonnegg features 3 different saunas and a large relaxation room with waterbeds. Massages are available on request, and bathrobes are provided for the duration of the stay free of charge. In winter, the pool is heated to 33 degrees. A fitness room is also available. The Sonnegg Hotel also features a restaurant with a bar and a fireplace lounge. Regional as well as international dishes are served, and any special dietary needs can be accommodated on request. Rooms are furnished in a modern Alpine style and feature a balcony, a flat-screen cable TV, a safe, and a bathroom with a hairdryer. In summer, guided motorbike tours are offered, including a tour to the Großglockner with the hotel owner once per week. A garage for motorbikes and bicycles and a drying room for motorbike and sports clothes are available free of charge, and free touring booklets are also provided. In winter, a free shuttle to the cable car is provided. Zell am See is 10 km away, and the Großglockner High Alpine Road is 20 km away. From late May to late October, the Joker Card is included in the rate. This card offers many free benefits and discounts, including free use of local cable cars and buses.

name: Hotel Alpenpanorama
description: Hotel Alpenpanorama is settled amidst the Tyrolean nature in Söll, next to a forest and 2 km from the SkiWelt Wilder Kaiser - Brixental ski area. The location allows for panoramic views over the village, the surrounding mountains Pölven, Hohe Salve and Wilder Kaiser, and the valley inbetween. Free WiFi and complimentary on-site parking facilities are provided. All rooms are fitted with a balcony and a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms are equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning, and the hotel restaurant serves regional as well as vegetarian specialities in the evenings. The spa and wellness centre can be used free of charge, and comes with several saunas, a steam bath and a fitness room. Massages and treatments can be booked at an additional cost. Guests are also welcome to relax at the bar, in the garden or on the terrace. Hotel Alpenpanorama offers easy access to many skiing facilities and hiking trails.

name: Aqua Dome
description: This luxurious 4-star superior hotel offers stunning views of the Ötztal Alps, spacious and elegant rooms, and the only thermal spring in Western Austria. The spectacular architecture of the Aqua Dome Hotel blends in harmoniously with its natural surroundings. The hotel’s large wellness area, which guests can access free of charge, offers spa pleasures on 20,000 m². An outdoor spa area, large lawn for sunbathing, saunas, beauty treatments, fitness centre, and the Alpen Arche Noah children's and family area provide ample opportunities for bathing and leisure activities. The restaurants serve regional and international cuisine, as well as healthy dishes, in a stylish setting. Drinks are served in the lounge, at the bar, and at the cosy wine bar, which has an open fireplace and leather sofas. Aqua Dome Hotel & Tirol Therme Längenfeld offers a separate water world for children and families, including 2 large pools and a giant water slide. In addition, families can have fun in the play rooms. The underground car park is available free of charge.

name: Kitzhof Mountain Design Resort 4 Sterne Superior
description: Surrounded by a picturesque mountain scenery, Hotel Kitzhof Mountain Design Resort is located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Kitzbühel. This 4-star design hotel features a 600 m² spa area with an indoor pool, a Finnish sauna, a steam bath and a solarium. Each room combines modern and traditional elements, like wooden material and natural light and includes a flat-screen TV. Free amenities include Wi-Fi and the use of the minibar in all rooms. Hotel Kitzhof’s spa area offers various beauty and body treatments. A fitness room featuring waterfall views is also available. Guests can enjoy local and international cuisine in the uniquely decorated restaurants. Tyrolean delicacies and healthy meals are also offered. In nice weather, meals are served on the terrace, next to a waterfall and a pond with views of Kitzbüheler Horn. Breakfast includes champagne and a wide range of regional products. The famous Hahnenkamm with the Streif downhill run is just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Krumers Alpin - Your Mountain Oasis
description: Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Seefeld and 150 metres from the Rosshütte cable car, the Krumers Alpin – Your Mountain Oasis is a 4-star superior hotel featuring a renovated 3,500 m² spa area with an all-year 240 m² large indoor and outdoor pool, a ski storage with a ski boot dryer, 4 conference rooms, an underground car park and car ports. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The Krumers Alpin – Your Mountain Oasis includes a large sauna area with a Finnish sauna, a laconium, an aroma-infused steam room, an Alpine herb steam room, an ice room with ice fountain, a tepidarium with heated stone loungers, 2 solariums, and a gym with TechnoGym and Precor equipment and an exercise room. A wide range of massage and beauty treatments is available as well. The spacious rooms include a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, and a bathroom with hairdryer. All rooms include a bag with bathrobes, slippers, and bathing towels. The generous half board includes a breakfast buffet, cakes in the afternoon, a 5-course dinner menu or a choice of dishes or buffet with vegetarian, vegan and allergen-free dishes. The cuisine is a contemporary interpretation of Austrian classics and international favourites. In summer, several hiking and biking trails, including theme trails, such as the Mental Power Trail, e-bike and mountain bike trails and a roller ski trail. Several lakes with public bathing beaches and golf clubs are in the vicinity.

name: Hotel Madlein
description: One of the most beautiful design hotels in the Alps, this hotel in the sunniest spot in Ischgl offers fantastic cuisine, excellent service and a world-famous nightclub. Combining cool stone with minimalistic Zen design, Hotel Madlein features comfortable Laura Ashley-style rooms with balcony and a bathroom designed by Philippe Starck. First-class wellness facilities await you in the spa area. The Beauty Spa offers facials and massages. There is a swimming pool guests can enjoy the fascinating view of the Tyrolean mountains. There is also a Finnish log cabin sauna outdoors, as well as an outdoor hot tub surrounded by torches (in winter only). The heart of the hotel is the cocktail bar with its open fireplace. In the restaurant you can admire one of the largest aquariums in Tyrol. Half-board comprises a rich breakfast buffet and a 5-course gourmet dinner. The meals are accompanied by first-class wines from the hotel's wine cellar and fine Cuban cigars are offered. With its in-house bar and club, the Table Dance, Hotel Madlein lives up to its reputation at the party hot spot of Ischgl. The nightclub is an exclusive club known for its high density of celebrities. Cable cars and ski slopes are just 100 metres away and can be comfortably reached with the underground escalator. The cable cars will take into the Silvretta Arena ski area, with 235 km of slopes and guaranteed snow cover from early December to early May. Ski passes are available at the reception. Ski and snowboarding equipment is available for hire at the hotel.

name: Superior Sport und Familienresort Alpenblick
address: Alte Landesstraße 6, 5700 Zell am See, Salzburg
description: Located in Zell am See, just a 10-minute walk from the centre and the Lake Zell, the family-run Superior Sport und Familienresort Alpenblick features a restaurant and an 1,100 m² wellness and spa area with a combined indoor and outdoor pool. The Areitbahn Cable Car and the closest ski slope are a 2-minute drive away. The country-style rooms and apartments provide free WiFi. A ski bus stops right in front of the hotel, and the Zell am See-Kaprun Golf Course is 3 km away. From mid-May to mid-October, the Zell am See-Kaprun Card is included in the rate. This card offers many free benefits and discounts, including free use of local cable cars and buses.

name: Hotel Tyrolerhof
description: Hotel Tyrolerhof features a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Sölden. This 4-star hotel offers a ski pass sales point and room service. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with a sauna, and hammam, as well as a bar. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hotel Tyrolerhof also offer free WiFi, while certain rooms include a balcony. Guest rooms at the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Tyrolerhof. The area is popular for skiing, and ski equipment hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Area 47 is 37 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Innsbruck Airport, 78 km from Hotel Tyrolerhof.

name: Hotel Goldene Rose
description: The Hotel Goldene Rose enjoys a scenic location in the village of Lechaschau, about 500 metres from the centre of Reutte. It offers a spa area, a restaurant serving traditional cuisine, and a large terrace. Free WiFi is available. The spacious rooms come with an LCD cable TV, a safe, and a bathroom. Some have a balcony, terrace or garden. The spa area includes a sauna, saunarium, aromatic steam bath, Kneipp basin, fitness area, and relaxation area. Tea, juices and fruits are also provided. Free parking is available at Hotel Goldene Rose, and there are also carports, a parking area for motorcycles, and a bicycle garage. The Alpentherme Ehrenberg in Reutte is reachable in a 10-minute walk, the Reutte Ski Area is 2.5 km away, and a ski bus stop is 50 metres from the property. Popular destinations for excursions such as the Bavarian Royal Castles and the Zugspitze, are easily reachable. Swimming is possible in Heiterwangersee, Urisee or additional lakes, located 6 km away or less. The Zugspitze Golf Club is 24 km away, and the highline179, the world's longest pedestrian bridge in the Tibet style, is 3 km from the property. The Aktiv Card is included in the rate and offers several discounts and benefits in the whole region.

name: Flairhotel am Wörthersee
description: Directly located on the quiet southern shore of Lake Wörthersee, 3.5 km from the centre of Velden, the Flairhotel features a private beach with deck chairs and sunshades, an indoor pool with a conservatory, and free WiFi access in the entire property. The Flairhotel’s rooms offer a full HD flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe, and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. All rooms are accessible by lift. Spa facilities include a combined Finnish and bio sauna and an infrared cabin. Massages are available on request and should to be ordered in advance. The Kerzenstüberl restaurant serves Austrian and international cuisine, as well as a rich breakfast buffet featuring organic products. In fine weather, meals are served on the large terrace overlooking the lake. At the hotel, guests can rent a selection of different bicycles for exploring the surrounding lake district. Electric bikes and mountain bikes are also available. Free private parking is available at Flairhotel am Wörthersee. The Wörthersee Plus Card, offering various discounts in the region, is included in the rate.

name: Cityhotel D&C
description: This modern 4-star hotel is right at the edge of St.Pölten’s Baroque Old Town and a 2-minute walk from the train station. It features a restaurant and a spa area. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All rooms at Cityhotel D&C have cable TV, a minibar, and a spacious bathroom with a hairdryer, a make-up mirror, and luxury toiletries. The spa and fitness area is located on the fifth floor and can be used free of charge. It includes a sauna, a steam bath, an infrared cabin, and a gym. A relaxation room and a sun terrace are also available. Massage treatments and the services of a personal trainer are provided on request. Cityhotel D&C St.Pölten’s restaurant serves classic Austrian and regional cuisine. New interpretations of Austrian dishes are created with regional and seasonal ingredients. There is also a bar, a wine and champagne lounge, and a garden in the courtyard. A free internet terminal is available in the lobby. The Lower Austrian government district and the Cultural District are within a 15-minute walk of the D&C Cityhotel.

name: Das Rivus
description: This family-run 4**** superior boutique hotel is located in Leogang, 50 metres from the Asitzbahn and 50 metres from Bikepark Leogang. Boutique Hotel Das Rivus offers a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. The accommodation features ski-to-door access and a ski pass sales point, as well as a bar and a garden. Other features includes a spa centre, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms. Apartments can be booked with or without breakfast or half board. Boutique Hotel Das Rivus offers buffet breakfast. Egg specialities such as fried eggs are also made to order. The accommodation offers a children's playroom. The area is popular for hiking and skiing at Boutique Hotel Das Rivus. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport, 71 km from the hotel.

name: Salzburger Hof
description: Surrounded by a majestic mountain landscape, this family-run 4-star superior hotel is located next to the Asitz Cable Car and the mountain bike park, in the Leogang-Saalbach-Hinterglemm Ski Area and 130 steps from the Saalbach-Hinterglemm ski circus. It offers panoramic views of the surrounding mountains. The Salzburger Hof's unique spa area on the glass-panelled fifth floor offers panoramic mountain views and features a panorama spa on 2 floors with relaxation rooms, 3 saunas, a steam bath, an infinity sky-pool. There is also a heated outdoor pool with mountain views. In the morning, you can enjoy a rich breakfast buffet with many organic products from surrounding farms. The restaurant serves international cuisine and regional specialities, as well as fine Austrian and international wines. Afternoon snacks are also served. The cross-country ski run is only 100 metres away from the Salzburger Hof, and in summer, mountain bikers enjoy the bike park next door. The nearby golf course offers reduced green fees to hotel guests. Salzburg, Berchtesgaden, Kitzbühel, Kaprun and Zell am See can be reached quickly and easily. A private parking garage is available at an additional cost. A transfer from the train stations in Leogang, Saalfelden and Hochfilzen is offered free of charge. Guests receive the Saalfelden Leogang Card all year around, which allows free admission and discounts at several local attractions, as well as for cable cars and public transport.

name: Das Alpenhaus Gasteinertal
description: The wellness hotel Das Alpenhaus Gasteinertal is located in the center of Bad Hofgastein, close to the Kurpark, pedestrian area and ski lifts. Free WiFi is available. Guests are accommodated in alpine style furnished, non-smoking rooms featuring a balcony with mountain views, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, and a bathroom with bathrobes and a hairdryer. The Alpenhaus restaurant offers a hotel bar, a sun terrace and serves international, vegetarian and vegan cuisine. The large spa area features an indoor pool with panoramic views, a whirlpool, and a sauna area. Massage and wellness treatments are available at a surcharge. A fitness room with high tech equipment and guided fitness and relaxation programs are offered to guests. During summer the Gastein Card offers many free benefits and discounts throughout the region. The Schlossalm ski lift is only a 7 minute walk from the Alpenhaus Gasteinertal and the Alpentherme Gastein can be reached within 250 meters.

name: Sonnenhotel Zum Stern
description: A wellness area consisting of various saunas, an indoor swimming pool and a hot tub is provided in Hotel Zum Stern. The superior hotel offers country-style rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The Angertal Ski and Hiking Area is an 8-minute drive away, accessible by the free ski bus outside. All rooms feature a balcony or a terrace with mountain views, and a bathroom with a shower or a bathtub. Some rooms come with a tile stove. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms and at the bar. A rich breakfast buffet is served at the hotel daily. Hotel Zum Stern comes with 2 restaurants and a cosy lobby with a bar and an open fireplace. You can take a sunbath in the garden or on the large terrace and request beauty- and physiotherapy treatments as well as massages. A gym, ideal for the daily work out, is provided on site. Bicycles can be borrowed free of charge and hiking tours are organised on a regular basis. You can buy ski passes on site and make use of the hotel’s games room. Shuttle services are available on request and free private parking is possible in front of the building. Zum Stern hotel comes with storage room for your ski, hiking and golf equipment, which is heated during winter. The 18-hole golf course Gastein is just a 10-minute drive away and offers you greenfee discounts. The centre of Bad Hofgastein can be reached within a 3-minute drive and Gastein is 7 km away.

name: At The Park Hotel
address: Kaiser Franz-Ring 5, 2500 Baden bei Wien, Niederosterreich
description: Located right in the Kurpark in the centre of Baden, only 200 metres from the casino and the Römertherme Thermal Spa, the At the Park Hotel offers a lobby bar, a spa area with a sauna, and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is available. The rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV, wooden or carpeted floors, and a bathroom. They offer views of the park or the Haus der Kunst Museum. Some rooms come with air conditioning and balcony. The double beds are fitted with 2 separate mattresses. The terrace overlooks the park and the casino. In fine weather, breakfast as well as coffee and cakes are served there. Hotel At the Park features 6 modern seminar rooms, an in-house vinotheque, and a wine tasting room.

name: Hotel Moarhof
description: Offering panoramic views of the Lienz Dolomites, Hotel Moarhof is surrounded by a large garden and offers a spa area and an a la carte restaurant, the Moarhofstüberl. The hotel's own free ski bus stops right outside. The Moarhof Hotel's spa area includes a heated outdoor pool (in summer), a Finnish sauna, a herbal sauna, an infrared cabin, and a steam bath. The relaxation area provides panoramic views of the Lienz Dolomites. Massages are offered at a surcharge. Rooms offer free WiFi, a flat-screen cable TV, a safe, and a bathroom with bathrobes and a hairdryer. A rich breakfast buffet is available every morning. Half-board is served in the hotel restaurant. In the wintertime you can go skiing and cross-country skiing in the vicinity. The 36-hole Dolomitengolf Golf Course is 9 km away. Private carport parking is available at a surcharge. A shuttle service from Lienz Train Station is available on request.

name: Gartenhotel Theresia 4-Sterne Superior
description: Situated in Saalbach Hinterglemm, 25 km from Zell am See-Kaprun Golf Course, Gartenhotel Theresia 4-Sterne Superior features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities are a shared lounge, a terrace, as well as a bar. The hotel has a hammam, a kids' club and free WiFi. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. At Gartenhotel Theresia 4-Sterne Superior every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving local and European cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Guests can relax in the wellness area, including an indoor pool, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden equipped with a children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and mini-golf at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and skiing. Casino Zell am See is 21 km from Gartenhotel Theresia 4-Sterne Superior, while Zell am See Train Station is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart, 89 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Active by Leitner's
description: Active by Leitner’s offers spacious rooms with mountain views and a large spa area with a heated outdoor pool. Free WiFi and parking are available free of charge. Spa facilities include a steam bath, sauna, herbal sauna, sun bed, infrared cabin, and a fitness room. Active by Leitner’s also offers sports activities with private coaches. The rooms have flat-screen cable TV, glass fronts and big balconies or terraces. Dinner is served in the Winklhof restaurant, which is located in a renovated, 600-year-old farmhouse a few steps from the hotel. The centre of Kaprun is only a few minutes‘ walk away from Active by Leitner’s. Hiking and cycling trails start in front of the hotel, and the ski bus stop is only a 2-minute walk away.

name: Neuhaus Zillertal Resort
description: Situated in the heart of Mayrhofen, Neuhaus Zillertal Resort enjoys a quiet location in the beautiful Ziller Valley. It offers a large spa area, a well-assorted wine cellar and free parking. Half-board comprises a rich breakfast buffet and a 4-course à la carte dinner with a salad buffet and a variety of desserts. Vegetarian and special dietetic meals will be provided on request by the Neuhaus. All rooms feature a private bathroom, cable TV and a seating area. Bathrobes are also provided. Most rooms also have a balcony with great mountain views. Guests of the Alpendomizil can relax in the hot tub or steam bath or get active and benefit from the guided hikes or the Nordic Walking and Yoga trainings. A small cinema, bowling alleys and a billiards table are also on site. Numerous mountain bike and hiking trails are nearby. The Zillertal 3000 ski area can be easily reached with the free ski bus, which stops a few steps from the Neuhaus.

name: Hotel Neue Post
description: Set in the Ziller Valley, Hotel Neue Post is located in the centre of Mayrhofen. The spa area includes an indoor pool. The Zillertal Congress Europahaus is 100 metres away. The traditionally furnished rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV as well as the Sky-Bundesliga channel, and a bathroom with hairdryer and make-up mirror. The Neue Post’s spa area can be used free of charge. It includes various saunas, an infrared cabin, a steam bath, and a fitness room. Half-board includes a large breakfast buffet, and a 5-course dinner with a salad buffet. Special menus for children, diabetics and vegetarians are prepared on request. The bar Posttenne features live music in the main season.Wine tasting is possible at the wine cellar on site. Guests can relax on the sun terrace. A ski storage room with a ski boot dryer and free private parking are available on site. The free ski bus to the Zillertal 3000 ski area stops right outside, and the stop of the ski bus to the Hintertux Glacier is a 2-minute walk away. A public swimming pool is 400 metres away.

name: Hotel Süd Graz
description: This 4-star design hotel enjoys a quiet location in the south of Graz, only a 20-minute drive from the Old Town. Hotel Süd art offers free WiFi and an indoor pool. The rooms feature a work desk, a minibar, and satellite TV. All rooms and bathrooms were renovated in 2009 and 2010. Some rooms are air-conditioned and feature a laptop-size safe. The spa area can be used free of charge and includes a sauna, an infrared cabin, and a fitness room. Bathrobes are provided free of charge in each of Hotel Süd art’s rooms. A rich and varied breakfast buffet is served every morning. Packed lunches are provided for guests leaving early in the morning. Various drinks are available at the bar, which is open until 22:00. 4 different restaurants are within an 8-minute walk of this bed and breakfast hotel. A private underground car park can be used at a surcharge. Free public parking spaces are available around the hotel. A charging station for electric cars is available at the hotel as well. Hotel Süd art is only 2 km away from the Webling and Seiersberg motorway exits. 2 large shopping centres are directly located at these exits. Graz Airport is 7 km away. The walk to the nearest bus stop connecting to the Old Town, which is 5 km away, takes 2 minutes.

name: Hotel Der Schütthof
description: Located in Zell am See, this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom guesthouse lets you experience it all. Fans of nature and the outdoors will love being 15 minutes by foot from Lake Zell and 4 minutes by car from Zeller See Beach. Schmittenhoehe Ski Resort is just steps away and AreitXpress Cable Car is within an easy 6-minute walk, so leave your car at the property, which offers covered onsite parking. While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and Internet, as well as a TV and a garden. Other amenities include towels, a table tennis table, a phone, and a hair dryer.VRBO
